224/**
225 * Protobufs utility. Be aware that a class named org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.ProtobufUtil
226 * (i.e. no 'shaded' in the package name) carries a COPY of a subset of this class for non-shaded
227 * users; e.g. Coprocessor Endpoints. If you make change in here, be sure to make change in the
228 * companion class too (not the end of the world, especially if you are adding new functionality but
229 * something to be aware of.
230 */
231@InterfaceAudience.Private // TODO: some clients (Hive, etc) use this class
232public final class ProtobufUtil {
233
234  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ProtobufUtil.class.getName());
235
236  private ProtobufUtil() {
237  }
238
239  /**
240   * Many results are simple: no cell, exists true or false. To save on object creations, we reuse
241   * them across calls.
242   */
243  private final static Cell[] EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY = new Cell[] {};
244  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT = Result.create(EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY);
245  final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE = Result.create(null, true);
246  final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE = Result.create(null, false);
247  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_STALE = Result.create(EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY, null, true);
248  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE =
249    Result.create((Cell[]) null, true, true);
250  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE =
251    Result.create((Cell[]) null, false, true);
252
253  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
254  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE;
255  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE;
256  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE;
257  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE;
258  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
259
260  static {
261    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
262
263    builder.setExists(true);
264    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
265    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE = builder.build();
266
267    builder.setStale(true);
268    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE = builder.build();
269    builder.clear();
270
271    builder.setExists(false);
272    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
273    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE = builder.build();
274    builder.setStale(true);
275    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE = builder.build();
276
277    builder.clear();
278    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
279    EMPTY_RESULT_PB = builder.build();
280    builder.setStale(true);
281    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE = builder.build();
282  }
283
284  private static volatile boolean classLoaderLoaded = false;
285
286  /**
287   * Dynamic class loader to load filter/comparators
288   */
289  private final static class ClassLoaderHolder {
290    private final static ClassLoader CLASS_LOADER;
291
292    static {
293      ClassLoader parent = ProtobufUtil.class.getClassLoader();
294      Configuration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create();
295      CLASS_LOADER = AccessController
296        .doPrivileged((PrivilegedAction<ClassLoader>) () -> new DynamicClassLoader(conf, parent));
297      classLoaderLoaded = true;
298    }
299  }
300
301  public static boolean isClassLoaderLoaded() {
302    return classLoaderLoaded;
303  }
304
305  private static final String PARSE_FROM = "parseFrom";
306
307  // We don't bother using the dynamic CLASS_LOADER above, because currently we can't support
308  // optimizing dynamically loaded classes. We can do it once we build for java9+, see the todo
309  // in ReflectedFunctionCache
310  private static final ReflectedFunctionCache<byte[], Filter> FILTERS =
311    new ReflectedFunctionCache<>(Filter.class, byte[].class, PARSE_FROM);
312  private static final ReflectedFunctionCache<byte[], ByteArrayComparable> COMPARATORS =
313    new ReflectedFunctionCache<>(ByteArrayComparable.class, byte[].class, PARSE_FROM);
314
315  private static volatile boolean ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH = true;
316
317  // Visible for tests
318  public static void setAllowFastReflectionFallthrough(boolean val) {
319    ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH = val;
320  }
321
322  /**
323   * Prepend the passed bytes with four bytes of magic, {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC}, to flag what
324   * follows as a protobuf in hbase. Prepend these bytes to all content written to znodes, etc.
325   * @param bytes Bytes to decorate
326   * @return The passed <code>bytes</code> with magic prepended (Creates a new byte array that is
327   *         <code>bytes.length</code> plus {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC}.length.
328   */
329  public static byte[] prependPBMagic(final byte[] bytes) {
330    return Bytes.add(PB_MAGIC, bytes);
331  }
332
333  /** Returns True if passed <code>bytes</code> has {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} for a prefix. */
334  public static boolean isPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes) {
335    return ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes);
336  }
337
338  /** Returns True if passed <code>bytes</code> has {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} for a prefix. */
339  public static boolean isPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes, int offset, int len) {
340    return ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes, offset, len);
341  }
342
343  /**
344   * Expect the {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} or throw an exception.
345   * @param bytes bytes to check
346   * @throws DeserializationException if we are missing the pb magic prefix
347   */
348  public static void expectPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes) throws DeserializationException {
349    if (!isPBMagicPrefix(bytes)) {
350      String bytesPrefix = bytes == null ? "null" : Bytes.toStringBinary(bytes, 0, PB_MAGIC.length);
351      throw new DeserializationException(
352        "Missing pb magic " + Bytes.toString(PB_MAGIC) + " prefix" + ", bytes: " + bytesPrefix);
353    }
354  }
355
356  /** Returns Length of {@link ProtobufMagic#lengthOfPBMagic()} */
357  public static int lengthOfPBMagic() {
358    return ProtobufMagic.lengthOfPBMagic();
359  }
360
361  public static ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable toByteArrayComparable(final byte[] value) {
362    ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable.Builder builder =
363      ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable.newBuilder();
364    if (value != null) builder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(value));
365    return builder.build();
366  }
367
368  /**
369   * Return the IOException thrown by the remote server wrapped in ServiceException as cause.
370   * @param se ServiceException that wraps IO exception thrown by the server
371   * @return Exception wrapped in ServiceException or a new IOException that wraps the unexpected
372   *         ServiceException.
373   */
374  public static IOException getRemoteException(ServiceException se) {
375    return makeIOExceptionOfException(se);
376  }
377
378  /**
379   * Like {@link #getRemoteException(ServiceException)} but more generic, able to handle more than
380   * just {@link ServiceException}. Prefer this method to
381   * {@link #getRemoteException(ServiceException)} because trying to contain direct protobuf
382   * references.
383   */
384  public static IOException handleRemoteException(Exception e) {
385    return makeIOExceptionOfException(e);
386  }
387
388  private static IOException makeIOExceptionOfException(Exception e) {
389    Throwable t = e;
390    if (e instanceof ServiceException) {
391      t = e.getCause();
392    }
393    if (ExceptionUtil.isInterrupt(t)) {
394      return ExceptionUtil.asInterrupt(t);
395    }
396    if (t instanceof RemoteException) {
397      t = ((RemoteException) t).unwrapRemoteException();
398    }
399    return t instanceof IOException ? (IOException) t : new HBaseIOException(t);
400  }
401
402  /**
403   * Convert a ServerName to a protocol buffer ServerName
404   * @param serverName the ServerName to convert
405   * @return the converted protocol buffer ServerName
406   * @see #toServerName(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.HBaseProtos.ServerName)
407   */
408  public static HBaseProtos.ServerName toServerName(final ServerName serverName) {
409    if (serverName == null) {
410      return null;
411    }
412    HBaseProtos.ServerName.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder();
413    builder.setHostName(serverName.getHostname());
414    if (serverName.getPort() >= 0) {
415      builder.setPort(serverName.getPort());
416    }
417    if (serverName.getStartcode() >= 0) {
418      builder.setStartCode(serverName.getStartcode());
419    }
420    return builder.build();
421  }
422
423  /**
424   * Convert a protocol buffer ServerName to a ServerName
425   * @param proto the protocol buffer ServerName to convert
426   * @return the converted ServerName
427   */
428  public static ServerName toServerName(final HBaseProtos.ServerName proto) {
429    if (proto == null) return null;
430    String hostName = proto.getHostName();
431    long startCode = -1;
432    int port = -1;
433    if (proto.hasPort()) {
434      port = proto.getPort();
435    }
436    if (proto.hasStartCode()) {
437      startCode = proto.getStartCode();
438    }
439    return ServerName.valueOf(hostName, port, startCode);
440  }
441
442  /**
443   * Convert a list of protocol buffer ServerName to a list of ServerName
444   * @param proto protocol buffer ServerNameList
445   * @return a list of ServerName
446   */
447  public static List<ServerName> toServerNameList(List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> proto) {
448    return proto.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toServerName).collect(Collectors.toList());
449  }
450
451  /**
452   * Get a list of NamespaceDescriptor from ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse protobuf
453   * @param proto the ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse
454   * @return a list of NamespaceDescriptor
455   */
456  public static List<NamespaceDescriptor>
457    toNamespaceDescriptorList(ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse proto) {
458    return proto.getNamespaceDescriptorList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toNamespaceDescriptor)
459      .collect(Collectors.toList());
460  }
461
462  /**
463   * Get a list of TableDescriptor from GetTableDescriptorsResponse protobuf
464   * @param proto the GetTableDescriptorsResponse
465   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
466   */
467  public static List<TableDescriptor> toTableDescriptorList(GetTableDescriptorsResponse proto) {
468    if (proto == null) {
469      return new ArrayList<>();
470    }
471    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
472      .collect(Collectors.toList());
473  }
474
475  /**
476   * Get a list of TableDescriptor from ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse protobuf
477   * @param proto the ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse
478   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
479   */
480  public static List<TableDescriptor>
481    toTableDescriptorList(ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse proto) {
482    if (proto == null) return new ArrayList<>();
483    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
484      .collect(Collectors.toList());
485  }
486
487  /**
488   * Get a list of TableDescriptor from ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse protobuf
489   * @param proto the ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse
490   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
491   */
492  public static List<TableDescriptor>
493    toTableDescriptorList(ListTableDescriptorsByStateResponse proto) {
494    if (proto == null) {
495      return new ArrayList<>();
496    }
497    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
498      .collect(Collectors.toList());
499  }
500
501  /**
502   * get the split keys in form "byte [][]" from a CreateTableRequest proto
503   * @param proto the CreateTableRequest
504   * @return the split keys
505   */
506  public static byte[][] getSplitKeysArray(final CreateTableRequest proto) {
507    byte[][] splitKeys = new byte[proto.getSplitKeysCount()][];
508    for (int i = 0; i < proto.getSplitKeysCount(); ++i) {
509      splitKeys[i] = proto.getSplitKeys(i).toByteArray();
510    }
511    return splitKeys;
512  }
513
514  /**
515   * Convert a protobuf Durability into a client Durability
516   */
517  public static Durability toDurability(final ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability proto) {
518    switch (proto) {
519      case USE_DEFAULT:
520        return Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
521      case SKIP_WAL:
522        return Durability.SKIP_WAL;
523      case ASYNC_WAL:
524        return Durability.ASYNC_WAL;
525      case SYNC_WAL:
526        return Durability.SYNC_WAL;
527      case FSYNC_WAL:
528        return Durability.FSYNC_WAL;
529      default:
530        return Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
531    }
532  }
533
534  /**
535   * Convert a client Durability into a protbuf Durability
536   */
537  public static ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability toDurability(final Durability d) {
538    switch (d) {
539      case USE_DEFAULT:
540        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
541      case SKIP_WAL:
542        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.SKIP_WAL;
543      case ASYNC_WAL:
544        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.ASYNC_WAL;
545      case SYNC_WAL:
546        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.SYNC_WAL;
547      case FSYNC_WAL:
548        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.FSYNC_WAL;
549      default:
550        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
551    }
552  }
553
554  /**
555   * Convert a protocol buffer Get to a client Get
556   * @param proto the protocol buffer Get to convert
557   * @return the converted client Get
558   */
559  public static Get toGet(final ClientProtos.Get proto) throws IOException {
560    if (proto == null) return null;
561    byte[] row = proto.getRow().toByteArray();
562    Get get = new Get(row);
563    if (proto.hasCacheBlocks()) {
564      get.setCacheBlocks(proto.getCacheBlocks());
565    }
566    if (proto.hasMaxVersions()) {
567      get.setMaxVersions(proto.getMaxVersions());
568    }
569    if (proto.hasStoreLimit()) {
570      get.setMaxResultsPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreLimit());
571    }
572    if (proto.hasStoreOffset()) {
573      get.setRowOffsetPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreOffset());
574    }
575    if (proto.getCfTimeRangeCount() > 0) {
576      for (HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange cftr : proto.getCfTimeRangeList()) {
577        TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(cftr.getTimeRange());
578        get.setColumnFamilyTimeRange(cftr.getColumnFamily().toByteArray(), timeRange.getMin(),
579          timeRange.getMax());
580      }
581    }
582    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
583      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
584      get.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
585    }
586    if (proto.hasFilter()) {
587      FilterProtos.Filter filter = proto.getFilter();
588      get.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
589    }
590    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
591      get.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
592    }
593    if (proto.getColumnCount() > 0) {
594      for (Column column : proto.getColumnList()) {
595        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
596        if (column.getQualifierCount() > 0) {
597          for (ByteString qualifier : column.getQualifierList()) {
598            get.addColumn(family, qualifier.toByteArray());
599          }
600        } else {
601          get.addFamily(family);
602        }
603      }
604    }
605    if (proto.hasExistenceOnly() && proto.getExistenceOnly()) {
606      get.setCheckExistenceOnly(true);
607    }
608    if (proto.hasConsistency()) {
609      get.setConsistency(toConsistency(proto.getConsistency()));
610    }
611    if (proto.hasLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand()) {
612      get.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(proto.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand());
613    }
614    return get;
615  }
616
617  public static Consistency toConsistency(ClientProtos.Consistency consistency) {
618    switch (consistency) {
619      case STRONG:
620        return Consistency.STRONG;
621      case TIMELINE:
622        return Consistency.TIMELINE;
623      default:
624        return Consistency.STRONG;
625    }
626  }
627
628  public static ClientProtos.Consistency toConsistency(Consistency consistency) {
629    switch (consistency) {
630      case STRONG:
631        return ClientProtos.Consistency.STRONG;
632      case TIMELINE:
633        return ClientProtos.Consistency.TIMELINE;
634      default:
635        return ClientProtos.Consistency.STRONG;
636    }
637  }
638
639  /**
640   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Put.
641   * @param proto The protocol buffer MutationProto to convert
642   * @return A client Put.
643   */
644  public static Put toPut(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
645    return toPut(proto, null);
646  }
647
648  /**
649   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Put.
650   * @param proto       The protocol buffer MutationProto to convert
651   * @param cellScanner If non-null, the Cell data that goes with this proto.
652   * @return A client Put.
653   */
654  public static Put toPut(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
655    throws IOException {
656    // TODO: Server-side at least why do we convert back to the Client types? Why not just pb it?
657    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
658    assert type == MutationType.PUT : type.name();
659    long timestamp = proto.hasTimestamp() ? proto.getTimestamp() : HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
660    Put put = proto.hasRow() ? new Put(proto.getRow().toByteArray(), timestamp) : null;
661    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
662    if (cellCount > 0) {
663      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
664      if (cellScanner == null) {
665        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
666          "Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: " + toShortString(proto));
667      }
668      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
669        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
670          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
671            + " no cell returned: " + toShortString(proto));
672        }
673        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
674        if (put == null) {
675          put = new Put(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength(), timestamp);
676        }
677        put.add(cell);
678      }
679    } else {
680      if (put == null) {
681        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
682      }
683      // The proto has the metadata and the data itself
684      ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder =
685        ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
686      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
687        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
688        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
689          if (!qv.hasValue()) {
690            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Missing required field: qualifier value");
691          }
692          long ts = timestamp;
693          if (qv.hasTimestamp()) {
694            ts = qv.getTimestamp();
695          }
696          byte[] allTagsBytes;
697          if (qv.hasTags()) {
698            allTagsBytes = qv.getTags().toByteArray();
699            if (qv.hasDeleteType()) {
700              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(proto.getRow().toByteArray()).setFamily(family)
701                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
702                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(fromDeleteType(qv.getDeleteType()).getCode())
703                .setTags(allTagsBytes).build());
704            } else {
705              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
706                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
707                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(Cell.Type.Put)
708                .setValue(qv.hasValue() ? qv.getValue().toByteArray() : null).setTags(allTagsBytes)
709                .build());
710            }
711          } else {
712            if (qv.hasDeleteType()) {
713              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
714                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
715                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(fromDeleteType(qv.getDeleteType()).getCode()).build());
716            } else {
717              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
718                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
719                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(Cell.Type.Put)
720                .setValue(qv.hasValue() ? qv.getValue().toByteArray() : null).build());
721            }
722          }
723        }
724      }
725    }
726    put.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
727    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
728      put.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
729    }
730    return put;
731  }
732
733  /**
734   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Delete
735   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
736   * @return the converted client Delete
737   */
738  public static Delete toDelete(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
739    return toDelete(proto, null);
740  }
741
742  /**
743   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Delete
744   * @param proto       the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
745   * @param cellScanner if non-null, the data that goes with this delete.
746   * @return the converted client Delete
747   */
748  public static Delete toDelete(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
749    throws IOException {
750    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
751    assert type == MutationType.DELETE : type.name();
752    long timestamp = proto.hasTimestamp() ? proto.getTimestamp() : HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
753    Delete delete = proto.hasRow() ? new Delete(proto.getRow().toByteArray(), timestamp) : null;
754    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
755    if (cellCount > 0) {
756      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
757      if (cellScanner == null) {
758        // TextFormat should be fine for a Delete since it carries no data, just coordinates.
759        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: "
760          + TextFormat.shortDebugString(proto));
761      }
762      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
763        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
764          // TextFormat should be fine for a Delete since it carries no data, just coordinates.
765          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
766            + " no cell returned: " + TextFormat.shortDebugString(proto));
767        }
768        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
769        if (delete == null) {
770          delete =
771            new Delete(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength(), timestamp);
772        }
773        delete.add(cell);
774      }
775    } else {
776      if (delete == null) {
777        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
778      }
779      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
780        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
781        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
782          DeleteType deleteType = qv.getDeleteType();
783          byte[] qualifier = null;
784          if (qv.hasQualifier()) {
785            qualifier = qv.getQualifier().toByteArray();
786          }
787          long ts = cellTimestampOrLatest(qv);
788          if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION) {
789            delete.addColumn(family, qualifier, ts);
790          } else if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS) {
791            delete.addColumns(family, qualifier, ts);
792          } else if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION) {
793            delete.addFamilyVersion(family, ts);
794          } else {
795            delete.addFamily(family, ts);
796          }
797        }
798      }
799    }
800    delete.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
801    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
802      delete.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
803    }
804    return delete;
805  }
806
807  @FunctionalInterface
808  private interface ConsumerWithException<T, U> {
809    void accept(T t, U u) throws IOException;
810  }
811
812  private static <T extends Mutation> T toDelta(Function<Bytes, T> supplier,
813    ConsumerWithException<T, Cell> consumer, final MutationProto proto,
814    final CellScanner cellScanner) throws IOException {
815    byte[] row = proto.hasRow() ? proto.getRow().toByteArray() : null;
816    T mutation = row == null ? null : supplier.apply(new Bytes(row));
817    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
818    if (cellCount > 0) {
819      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
820      if (cellScanner == null) {
821        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
822          "Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: " + toShortString(proto));
823      }
824      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
825        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
826          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
827            + " no cell returned: " + toShortString(proto));
828        }
829        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
830        if (mutation == null) {
831          mutation =
832            supplier.apply(new Bytes(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength()));
833        }
834        consumer.accept(mutation, cell);
835      }
836    } else {
837      if (mutation == null) {
838        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
839      }
840      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
841        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
842        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
843          byte[] qualifier = qv.getQualifier().toByteArray();
844          if (!qv.hasValue()) {
845            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Missing required field: qualifier value");
846          }
847          byte[] value = qv.getValue().toByteArray();
848          byte[] tags = null;
849          if (qv.hasTags()) {
850            tags = qv.getTags().toByteArray();
851          }
852          consumer.accept(mutation,
853            ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY)
854              .setRow(mutation.getRow()).setFamily(family).setQualifier(qualifier)
855              .setTimestamp(cellTimestampOrLatest(qv)).setType(KeyValue.Type.Put.getCode())
856              .setValue(value).setTags(tags).build());
857        }
858      }
859    }
860    mutation.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
861    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
862      mutation.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
863    }
864    return mutation;
865  }
866
867  private static long cellTimestampOrLatest(QualifierValue cell) {
868    if (cell.hasTimestamp()) {
869      return cell.getTimestamp();
870    } else {
871      return HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
872    }
873  }
874
875  /**
876   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to an Append
877   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
878   * @return the converted client Append
879   */
880  public static Append toAppend(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
881    throws IOException {
882    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
883    assert type == MutationType.APPEND : type.name();
884    Append append = toDelta((Bytes row) -> new Append(row.get(), row.getOffset(), row.getLength()),
885      Append::add, proto, cellScanner);
886    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
887      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
888      append.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
889    }
890    return append;
891  }
892
893  /**
894   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to an Increment
895   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
896   * @return the converted client Increment
897   */
898  public static Increment toIncrement(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
899    throws IOException {
900    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
901    assert type == MutationType.INCREMENT : type.name();
902    Increment increment =
903      toDelta((Bytes row) -> new Increment(row.get(), row.getOffset(), row.getLength()),
904        Increment::add, proto, cellScanner);
905    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
906      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
907      increment.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
908    }
909    return increment;
910  }
911
912  /**
913   * Convert a MutateRequest to Mutation
914   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
915   * @return the converted Mutation
916   */
917  public static Mutation toMutation(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
918    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
919    if (type == MutationType.INCREMENT) {
920      return toIncrement(proto, null);
921    }
922    if (type == MutationType.APPEND) {
923      return toAppend(proto, null);
924    }
925    if (type == MutationType.DELETE) {
926      return toDelete(proto, null);
927    }
928    if (type == MutationType.PUT) {
929      return toPut(proto, null);
930    }
931    throw new IOException("Unknown mutation type " + type);
932  }
933
934  public static ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType toReadType(Scan.ReadType readType) {
935    switch (readType) {
936      case DEFAULT:
937        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT;
938      case STREAM:
939        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.STREAM;
940      case PREAD:
941        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.PREAD;
942      default:
943        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ReadType: " + readType);
944    }
945  }
946
947  public static Scan.ReadType toReadType(ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType readType) {
948    switch (readType) {
949      case DEFAULT:
950        return Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT;
951      case STREAM:
952        return Scan.ReadType.STREAM;
953      case PREAD:
954        return Scan.ReadType.PREAD;
955      default:
956        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ReadType: " + readType);
957    }
958  }
959
960  /**
961   * Convert a client Scan to a protocol buffer Scan
962   * @param scan the client Scan to convert
963   * @return the converted protocol buffer Scan
964   */
965  public static ClientProtos.Scan toScan(final Scan scan) throws IOException {
966    ClientProtos.Scan.Builder scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder();
967    scanBuilder.setCacheBlocks(scan.getCacheBlocks());
968    if (scan.getBatch() > 0) {
969      scanBuilder.setBatchSize(scan.getBatch());
970    }
971    if (scan.getMaxResultSize() > 0) {
972      scanBuilder.setMaxResultSize(scan.getMaxResultSize());
973    }
974    if (scan.isSmall()) {
975      scanBuilder.setSmall(scan.isSmall());
976    }
977    if (scan.getAllowPartialResults()) {
978      scanBuilder.setAllowPartialResults(scan.getAllowPartialResults());
979    }
980    Boolean loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand = scan.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemandValue();
981    if (loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand != null) {
982      scanBuilder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand);
983    }
984    scanBuilder.setMaxVersions(scan.getMaxVersions());
985    scan.getColumnFamilyTimeRange().forEach((cf, timeRange) -> {
986      scanBuilder.addCfTimeRange(HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange.newBuilder()
987        .setColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cf)).setTimeRange(toTimeRange(timeRange))
988        .build());
989    });
990    scanBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(scan.getTimeRange()));
991    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = scan.getAttributesMap();
992    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
993      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
994      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
995        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
996        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
997        scanBuilder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
998      }
999    }
1000    byte[] startRow = scan.getStartRow();
1001    if (startRow != null && startRow.length > 0) {
1002      scanBuilder.setStartRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(startRow));
1003    }
1004    byte[] stopRow = scan.getStopRow();
1005    if (stopRow != null && stopRow.length > 0) {
1006      scanBuilder.setStopRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(stopRow));
1007    }
1008    if (scan.hasFilter()) {
1009      scanBuilder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(scan.getFilter()));
1010    }
1011    if (scan.hasFamilies()) {
1012      Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
1013      for (Map.Entry<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> family : scan.getFamilyMap().entrySet()) {
1014        columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1015        NavigableSet<byte[]> qualifiers = family.getValue();
1016        columnBuilder.clearQualifier();
1017        if (qualifiers != null && qualifiers.size() > 0) {
1018          for (byte[] qualifier : qualifiers) {
1019            columnBuilder.addQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(qualifier));
1020          }
1021        }
1022        scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
1023      }
1024    }
1025    if (scan.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily() >= 0) {
1026      scanBuilder.setStoreLimit(scan.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily());
1027    }
1028    if (scan.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily() > 0) {
1029      scanBuilder.setStoreOffset(scan.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily());
1030    }
1031    if (scan.isReversed()) {
1032      scanBuilder.setReversed(scan.isReversed());
1033    }
1034    if (scan.getConsistency() == Consistency.TIMELINE) {
1035      scanBuilder.setConsistency(toConsistency(scan.getConsistency()));
1036    }
1037    if (scan.getCaching() > 0) {
1038      scanBuilder.setCaching(scan.getCaching());
1039    }
1040    long mvccReadPoint = PackagePrivateFieldAccessor.getMvccReadPoint(scan);
1041    if (mvccReadPoint > 0) {
1042      scanBuilder.setMvccReadPoint(mvccReadPoint);
1043    }
1044    if (!scan.includeStartRow()) {
1045      scanBuilder.setIncludeStartRow(false);
1046    }
1047    scanBuilder.setIncludeStopRow(scan.includeStopRow());
1048    if (scan.getReadType() != Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT) {
1049      scanBuilder.setReadType(toReadType(scan.getReadType()));
1050    }
1051    if (scan.isNeedCursorResult()) {
1052      scanBuilder.setNeedCursorResult(true);
1053    }
1054    return scanBuilder.build();
1055  }
1056
1057  /**
1058   * Convert a protocol buffer Scan to a client Scan
1059   * @param proto the protocol buffer Scan to convert
1060   * @return the converted client Scan
1061   */
1062  public static Scan toScan(final ClientProtos.Scan proto) throws IOException {
1063    byte[] startRow = HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW;
1064    byte[] stopRow = HConstants.EMPTY_END_ROW;
1065    boolean includeStartRow = true;
1066    boolean includeStopRow = false;
1067    if (proto.hasStartRow()) {
1068      startRow = proto.getStartRow().toByteArray();
1069    }
1070    if (proto.hasStopRow()) {
1071      stopRow = proto.getStopRow().toByteArray();
1072    }
1073    if (proto.hasIncludeStartRow()) {
1074      includeStartRow = proto.getIncludeStartRow();
1075    }
1076    if (proto.hasIncludeStopRow()) {
1077      includeStopRow = proto.getIncludeStopRow();
1078    } else {
1079      // old client without this flag, we should consider start=end as a get.
1080      if (ClientUtil.areScanStartRowAndStopRowEqual(startRow, stopRow)) {
1081        includeStopRow = true;
1082      }
1083    }
1084    Scan scan =
1085      new Scan().withStartRow(startRow, includeStartRow).withStopRow(stopRow, includeStopRow);
1086    if (proto.hasCacheBlocks()) {
1087      scan.setCacheBlocks(proto.getCacheBlocks());
1088    }
1089    if (proto.hasMaxVersions()) {
1090      scan.setMaxVersions(proto.getMaxVersions());
1091    }
1092    if (proto.hasStoreLimit()) {
1093      scan.setMaxResultsPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreLimit());
1094    }
1095    if (proto.hasStoreOffset()) {
1096      scan.setRowOffsetPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreOffset());
1097    }
1098    if (proto.hasLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand()) {
1099      scan.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(proto.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand());
1100    }
1101    if (proto.getCfTimeRangeCount() > 0) {
1102      for (HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange cftr : proto.getCfTimeRangeList()) {
1103        TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(cftr.getTimeRange());
1104        scan.setColumnFamilyTimeRange(cftr.getColumnFamily().toByteArray(), timeRange.getMin(),
1105          timeRange.getMax());
1106      }
1107    }
1108    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
1109      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
1110      scan.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
1111    }
1112    if (proto.hasFilter()) {
1113      FilterProtos.Filter filter = proto.getFilter();
1114      scan.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
1115    }
1116    if (proto.hasBatchSize()) {
1117      scan.setBatch(proto.getBatchSize());
1118    }
1119    if (proto.hasMaxResultSize()) {
1120      scan.setMaxResultSize(proto.getMaxResultSize());
1121    }
1122    if (proto.hasSmall()) {
1123      scan.setSmall(proto.getSmall());
1124    }
1125    if (proto.hasAllowPartialResults()) {
1126      scan.setAllowPartialResults(proto.getAllowPartialResults());
1127    }
1128    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
1129      scan.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
1130    }
1131    if (proto.getColumnCount() > 0) {
1132      for (Column column : proto.getColumnList()) {
1133        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
1134        if (column.getQualifierCount() > 0) {
1135          for (ByteString qualifier : column.getQualifierList()) {
1136            scan.addColumn(family, qualifier.toByteArray());
1137          }
1138        } else {
1139          scan.addFamily(family);
1140        }
1141      }
1142    }
1143    if (proto.hasReversed()) {
1144      scan.setReversed(proto.getReversed());
1145    }
1146    if (proto.hasConsistency()) {
1147      scan.setConsistency(toConsistency(proto.getConsistency()));
1148    }
1149    if (proto.hasCaching()) {
1150      scan.setCaching(proto.getCaching());
1151    }
1152    if (proto.hasMvccReadPoint()) {
1153      PackagePrivateFieldAccessor.setMvccReadPoint(scan, proto.getMvccReadPoint());
1154    }
1155    if (scan.isSmall()) {
1156      scan.setReadType(Scan.ReadType.PREAD);
1157    } else if (proto.hasReadType()) {
1158      scan.setReadType(toReadType(proto.getReadType()));
1159    }
1160    if (proto.getNeedCursorResult()) {
1161      scan.setNeedCursorResult(true);
1162    }
1163    return scan;
1164  }
1165
1166  public static ClientProtos.Cursor toCursor(Cursor cursor) {
1167    ClientProtos.Cursor.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder();
1168    ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(cursor.getRow()));
1169    return builder.build();
1170  }
1171
1172  public static ClientProtos.Cursor toCursor(Cell cell) {
1173    return ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder()
1174      .setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength()))
1175      .build();
1176  }
1177
1178  public static Cursor toCursor(ClientProtos.Cursor cursor) {
1179    return ClientUtil.createCursor(cursor.getRow().toByteArray());
1180  }
1181
1182  /**
1183   * Create a protocol buffer Get based on a client Get.
1184   * @param get the client Get
1185   * @return a protocol buffer Get
1186   */
1187  public static ClientProtos.Get toGet(final Get get) throws IOException {
1188    ClientProtos.Get.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder();
1189    builder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(get.getRow()));
1190    builder.setCacheBlocks(get.getCacheBlocks());
1191    builder.setMaxVersions(get.getMaxVersions());
1192    if (get.getFilter() != null) {
1193      builder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(get.getFilter()));
1194    }
1195    get.getColumnFamilyTimeRange().forEach((cf, timeRange) -> {
1196      builder.addCfTimeRange(HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange.newBuilder()
1197        .setColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cf)).setTimeRange(toTimeRange(timeRange))
1198        .build());
1199    });
1200    builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(get.getTimeRange()));
1201    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = get.getAttributesMap();
1202    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
1203      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1204      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
1205        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
1206        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
1207        builder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
1208      }
1209    }
1210    if (get.hasFamilies()) {
1211      Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
1212      Map<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> families = get.getFamilyMap();
1213      for (Map.Entry<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> family : families.entrySet()) {
1214        NavigableSet<byte[]> qualifiers = family.getValue();
1215        columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1216        columnBuilder.clearQualifier();
1217        if (qualifiers != null && qualifiers.size() > 0) {
1218          for (byte[] qualifier : qualifiers) {
1219            columnBuilder.addQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(qualifier));
1220          }
1221        }
1222        builder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
1223      }
1224    }
1225    if (get.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily() >= 0) {
1226      builder.setStoreLimit(get.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily());
1227    }
1228    if (get.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily() > 0) {
1229      builder.setStoreOffset(get.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily());
1230    }
1231    if (get.isCheckExistenceOnly()) {
1232      builder.setExistenceOnly(true);
1233    }
1234    if (get.getConsistency() != null && get.getConsistency() != Consistency.STRONG) {
1235      builder.setConsistency(toConsistency(get.getConsistency()));
1236    }
1237
1238    Boolean loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand = get.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemandValue();
1239    if (loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand != null) {
1240      builder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand);
1241    }
1242    return builder.build();
1243  }
1244
1245  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation)
1246    throws IOException {
1247    return toMutation(type, mutation, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1248  }
1249
1250  /**
1251   * Create a protocol buffer Mutate based on a client Mutation
1252   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1253   */
1254  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1255    final long nonce) throws IOException {
1256    return toMutation(type, mutation, MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce);
1257  }
1258
1259  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1260    MutationProto.Builder builder) throws IOException {
1261    return toMutation(type, mutation, builder, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1262  }
1263
1264  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1265    MutationProto.Builder builder, long nonce) throws IOException {
1266    builder = getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(type, mutation, builder);
1267    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
1268      builder.setNonce(nonce);
1269    }
1270    if (type == MutationType.INCREMENT) {
1271      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Increment) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1272    }
1273    if (type == MutationType.APPEND) {
1274      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Append) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1275    }
1276    ColumnValue.Builder columnBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
1277    QualifierValue.Builder valueBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
1278    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<Cell>> family : mutation.getFamilyCellMap().entrySet()) {
1279      columnBuilder.clear();
1280      columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1281      for (Cell cell : family.getValue()) {
1282        valueBuilder.clear();
1283        valueBuilder.setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getQualifierArray(),
1284          cell.getQualifierOffset(), cell.getQualifierLength()));
1285        valueBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getValueArray(),
1286          cell.getValueOffset(), cell.getValueLength()));
1287        valueBuilder.setTimestamp(cell.getTimestamp());
1288        if (type == MutationType.DELETE || (type == MutationType.PUT && CellUtil.isDelete(cell))) {
1289          KeyValue.Type keyValueType = KeyValue.Type.codeToType(cell.getTypeByte());
1290          valueBuilder.setDeleteType(toDeleteType(keyValueType));
1291        }
1292        columnBuilder.addQualifierValue(valueBuilder.build());
1293      }
1294      builder.addColumnValue(columnBuilder.build());
1295    }
1296    return builder.build();
1297  }
1298
1299  /**
1300   * Create a protocol buffer MutationProto based on a client Mutation. Does NOT include data.
1301   * Understanding is that the Cell will be transported other than via protobuf.
1302   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1303   */
1304  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1305    final MutationProto.Builder builder) throws IOException {
1306    return toMutationNoData(type, mutation, builder, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1307  }
1308
1309  /**
1310   * Create a protocol buffer MutationProto based on a client Mutation. Does NOT include data.
1311   * Understanding is that the Cell will be transported other than via protobuf.
1312   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1313   */
1314  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation)
1315    throws IOException {
1316    MutationProto.Builder builder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
1317    return toMutationNoData(type, mutation, builder);
1318  }
1319
1320  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1321    final MutationProto.Builder builder, long nonce) throws IOException {
1322    getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(type, mutation, builder);
1323    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(mutation.size());
1324    if (mutation instanceof Increment) {
1325      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Increment) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1326    }
1327    if (mutation instanceof Append) {
1328      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Append) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1329    }
1330    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
1331      builder.setNonce(nonce);
1332    }
1333    return builder.build();
1334  }
1335
1336  /**
1337   * Code shared by {@link #toMutation(MutationType, Mutation)} and
1338   * {@link #toMutationNoData(MutationType, Mutation)}
1339   * @return A partly-filled out protobuf'd Mutation.
1340   */
1341  private static MutationProto.Builder getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(final MutationType type,
1342    final Mutation mutation, MutationProto.Builder builder) {
1343    builder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(mutation.getRow()));
1344    builder.setMutateType(type);
1345    builder.setDurability(toDurability(mutation.getDurability()));
1346    builder.setTimestamp(mutation.getTimestamp());
1347    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = mutation.getAttributesMap();
1348    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
1349      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1350      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
1351        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
1352        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
1353        builder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
1354      }
1355    }
1356    return builder;
1357  }
1358
1359  /**
1360   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1361   * @param result the client Result to convert
1362   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1363   */
1364  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final Result result) {
1365    return toResult(result, false);
1366  }
1367
1368  /**
1369   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1370   * @param result     the client Result to convert
1371   * @param encodeTags whether to includeTags in converted protobuf result or not When @encodeTags
1372   *                   is set to true, it will return all the tags in the response. These tags may
1373   *                   contain some sensitive data like acl permissions, etc. Only the tools like
1374   *                   Export, Import which needs to take backup needs to set it to true so that
1375   *                   cell tags are persisted in backup. Refer to HBASE-25246 for more context.
1376   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1377   */
1378  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final Result result, boolean encodeTags) {
1379    if (result.getExists() != null) {
1380      return toResult(result.getExists(), result.isStale());
1381    }
1382
1383    Cell[] cells = result.rawCells();
1384    if (cells == null || cells.length == 0) {
1385      return result.isStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
1386    }
1387
1388    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
1389    for (Cell c : cells) {
1390      builder.addCell(toCell(c, encodeTags));
1391    }
1392
1393    builder.setStale(result.isStale());
1394    builder.setPartial(result.mayHaveMoreCellsInRow());
1395
1396    return builder.build();
1397  }
1398
1399  /**
1400   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1401   * @param existence the client existence to send
1402   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1403   */
1404  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final boolean existence, boolean stale) {
1405    if (stale) {
1406      return existence ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1407    } else {
1408      return existence ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE;
1409    }
1410  }
1411
1412  /**
1413   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result. The pb Result does not include the Cell
1414   * data. That is for transport otherwise.
1415   * @param result the client Result to convert
1416   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1417   */
1418  public static ClientProtos.Result toResultNoData(final Result result) {
1419    if (result.getExists() != null) return toResult(result.getExists(), result.isStale());
1420    int size = result.size();
1421    if (size == 0) return result.isStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
1422    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
1423    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(size);
1424    builder.setStale(result.isStale());
1425    return builder.build();
1426  }
1427
1428  /**
1429   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1430   * @param proto the protocol buffer Result to convert
1431   * @return the converted client Result
1432   */
1433  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto) {
1434    return toResult(proto, false);
1435  }
1436
1437  /**
1438   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1439   * @param proto      the protocol buffer Result to convert
1440   * @param decodeTags whether to decode tags into converted client Result When @decodeTags is set
1441   *                   to true, it will decode all the tags from the response. These tags may
1442   *                   contain some sensitive data like acl permissions, etc. Only the tools like
1443   *                   Export, Import which needs to take backup needs to set it to true so that
1444   *                   cell tags are persisted in backup. Refer to HBASE-25246 for more context.
1445   * @return the converted client Result
1446   */
1447  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto, boolean decodeTags) {
1448    if (proto.hasExists()) {
1449      if (proto.getStale()) {
1450        return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1451      }
1452      return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
1453    }
1454
1455    List<CellProtos.Cell> values = proto.getCellList();
1456    if (values.isEmpty()) {
1457      return proto.getStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT;
1458    }
1459
1460    List<Cell> cells = new ArrayList<>(values.size());
1461    ExtendedCellBuilder builder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
1462    for (CellProtos.Cell c : values) {
1463      cells.add(toCell(builder, c, decodeTags));
1464    }
1465    return Result.create(cells, null, proto.getStale(), proto.getPartial());
1466  }
1467
1468  /**
1469   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1470   * @param proto   the protocol buffer Result to convert
1471   * @param scanner Optional cell scanner.
1472   * @return the converted client Result
1473   */
1474  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto, final CellScanner scanner)
1475    throws IOException {
1476    List<CellProtos.Cell> values = proto.getCellList();
1477
1478    if (proto.hasExists()) {
1479      if (
1480        (values != null && !values.isEmpty())
1481          || (proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() && proto.getAssociatedCellCount() > 0)
1482      ) {
1483        throw new IllegalArgumentException("bad proto: exists with cells is no allowed " + proto);
1484      }
1485      if (proto.getStale()) {
1486        return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1487      }
1488      return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
1489    }
1490
1491    // TODO: Unit test that has some Cells in scanner and some in the proto.
1492    List<Cell> cells = null;
1493    if (proto.hasAssociatedCellCount()) {
1494      int count = proto.getAssociatedCellCount();
1495      cells = new ArrayList<>(count + values.size());
1496      for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1497        if (!scanner.advance()) throw new IOException("Failed get " + i + " of " + count);
1498        cells.add(scanner.current());
1499      }
1500    }
1501
1502    if (!values.isEmpty()) {
1503      if (cells == null) cells = new ArrayList<>(values.size());
1504      ExtendedCellBuilder builder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
1505      for (CellProtos.Cell c : values) {
1506        cells.add(toCell(builder, c, false));
1507      }
1508    }
1509
1510    return (cells == null || cells.isEmpty())
1511      ? (proto.getStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT)
1512      : Result.create(cells, null, proto.getStale());
1513  }
1514
1515  /**
1516   * Convert a ByteArrayComparable to a protocol buffer Comparator
1517   * @param comparator the ByteArrayComparable to convert
1518   * @return the converted protocol buffer Comparator
1519   */
1520  public static ComparatorProtos.Comparator toComparator(ByteArrayComparable comparator) {
1521    ComparatorProtos.Comparator.Builder builder = ComparatorProtos.Comparator.newBuilder();
1522    builder.setName(comparator.getClass().getName());
1523    builder.setSerializedComparator(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(comparator.toByteArray()));
1524    return builder.build();
1525  }
1526
1527  /**
1528   * Convert a protocol buffer Comparator to a ByteArrayComparable
1529   * @param proto the protocol buffer Comparator to convert
1530   * @return the converted ByteArrayComparable
1531   */
1532  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1533  public static ByteArrayComparable toComparator(ComparatorProtos.Comparator proto)
1534    throws IOException {
1535    String type = proto.getName();
1536    byte[] value = proto.getSerializedComparator().toByteArray();
1537
1538    try {
1539      ByteArrayComparable result = COMPARATORS.getAndCallByName(type, value);
1540      if (result != null) {
1541        return result;
1542      }
1543
1544      if (!ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH) {
1545        throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to deserialize comparator " + type
1546          + " because fast reflection returned null and fallthrough is disabled");
1547      }
1548
1549      Class<?> c = Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1550      Method parseFrom = c.getMethod(PARSE_FROM, byte[].class);
1551      if (parseFrom == null) {
1552        throw new IOException("Unable to locate function: " + PARSE_FROM + " in type: " + type);
1553      }
1554      return (ByteArrayComparable) parseFrom.invoke(null, value);
1555    } catch (Exception e) {
1556      throw new IOException(e);
1557    }
1558  }
1559
1560  /**
1561   * Convert a protocol buffer Filter to a client Filter
1562   * @param proto the protocol buffer Filter to convert
1563   * @return the converted Filter
1564   */
1565  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1566  public static Filter toFilter(FilterProtos.Filter proto) throws IOException {
1567    String type = proto.getName();
1568    final byte[] value = proto.getSerializedFilter().toByteArray();
1569
1570    try {
1571      Filter result = FILTERS.getAndCallByName(type, value);
1572      if (result != null) {
1573        return result;
1574      }
1575
1576      if (!ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH) {
1577        throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to deserialize comparator " + type
1578          + " because fast reflection returned null and fallthrough is disabled");
1579      }
1580
1581      Class<?> c = Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1582      Method parseFrom = c.getMethod(PARSE_FROM, byte[].class);
1583      if (parseFrom == null) {
1584        throw new IOException("Unable to locate function: " + PARSE_FROM + " in type: " + type);
1585      }
1586      return (Filter) parseFrom.invoke(c, value);
1587    } catch (Exception e) {
1588      // Either we couldn't instantiate the method object, or "parseFrom" failed.
1589      // In either case, let's not retry.
1590      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e);
1591    }
1592  }
1593
1594  /**
1595   * Convert a client Filter to a protocol buffer Filter
1596   * @param filter the Filter to convert
1597   * @return the converted protocol buffer Filter
1598   */
1599  public static FilterProtos.Filter toFilter(Filter filter) throws IOException {
1600    FilterProtos.Filter.Builder builder = FilterProtos.Filter.newBuilder();
1601    builder.setName(filter.getClass().getName());
1602    builder.setSerializedFilter(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(filter.toByteArray()));
1603    return builder.build();
1604  }
1605
1606  /**
1607   * Convert a delete KeyValue type to protocol buffer DeleteType.
1608   * @return protocol buffer DeleteType
1609   */
1610  public static DeleteType toDeleteType(KeyValue.Type type) throws IOException {
1611    switch (type) {
1612      case Delete:
1613        return DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION;
1614      case DeleteColumn:
1615        return DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS;
1616      case DeleteFamily:
1617        return DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY;
1618      case DeleteFamilyVersion:
1619        return DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION;
1620      default:
1621        throw new IOException("Unknown delete type: " + type);
1622    }
1623  }
1624
1625  /**
1626   * Convert a protocol buffer DeleteType to delete KeyValue type.
1627   * @param type The DeleteType
1628   * @return The type.
1629   */
1630  public static KeyValue.Type fromDeleteType(DeleteType type) throws IOException {
1631    switch (type) {
1632      case DELETE_ONE_VERSION:
1633        return KeyValue.Type.Delete;
1634      case DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS:
1635        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteColumn;
1636      case DELETE_FAMILY:
1637        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteFamily;
1638      case DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION:
1639        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteFamilyVersion;
1640      default:
1641        throw new IOException("Unknown delete type: " + type);
1642    }
1643  }
1644
1645  /**
1646   * Convert a stringified protocol buffer exception Parameter to a Java Exception
1647   * @param parameter the protocol buffer Parameter to convert
1648   * @return the converted Exception
1649   * @throws IOException if failed to deserialize the parameter
1650   */
1651  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1652  public static Throwable toException(final NameBytesPair parameter) throws IOException {
1653    if (parameter == null || !parameter.hasValue()) return null;
1654    String desc = parameter.getValue().toStringUtf8();
1655    String type = parameter.getName();
1656    try {
1657      Class<? extends Throwable> c =
1658        (Class<? extends Throwable>) Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1659      Constructor<? extends Throwable> cn = null;
1660      try {
1661        cn = c.getDeclaredConstructor(String.class);
1662        return cn.newInstance(desc);
1663      } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
1664        // Could be a raw RemoteException. See HBASE-8987.
1665        cn = c.getDeclaredConstructor(String.class, String.class);
1666        return cn.newInstance(type, desc);
1667      }
1668    } catch (Exception e) {
1669      throw new IOException(e);
1670    }
1671  }
1672
1673  // Start helpers for Client
1674
1675  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1676  public static <T extends Service> T newServiceStub(Class<T> service, RpcChannel channel)
1677    throws Exception {
1678    return (T) Methods.call(service, null, "newStub", new Class[] { RpcChannel.class },
1679      new Object[] { channel });
1680  }

1685  /**
1686   * A helper to retrieve region info given a region name or an encoded region name using admin
1687   * protocol.
1688   * @return the retrieved region info
1689   */
1690  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo getRegionInfo(
1691    final RpcController controller, final AdminService.BlockingInterface admin,
1692    final byte[] regionName) throws IOException {
1693    try {
1694      GetRegionInfoRequest request =
1695        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.isEncodedRegionName(regionName)
1696          ? GetRegionInfoRequest.newBuilder()
1697            .setRegion(RequestConverter
1698              .buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, regionName))
1699            .build()
1700          : RequestConverter.buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName);
1701      GetRegionInfoResponse response = admin.getRegionInfo(controller, request);
1702      return toRegionInfo(response.getRegionInfo());
1703    } catch (ServiceException se) {
1704      throw getRemoteException(se);
1705    }
1706  }
1707
1708  public static List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.RegionLoad>
1709    getRegionLoadInfo(GetRegionLoadResponse regionLoadResponse) {
1710    List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.RegionLoad> regionLoadList =
1711      new ArrayList<>(regionLoadResponse.getRegionLoadsCount());
1712    for (RegionLoad regionLoad : regionLoadResponse.getRegionLoadsList()) {
1713      regionLoadList.add(new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.RegionLoad(regionLoad));
1714    }
1715    return regionLoadList;
1716  }

1723    throws IOException {

1725      ProtobufUtil.buildCloseRegionRequest(server, regionName);

1727      admin.closeRegion(controller, closeRegionRequest);
1728    } catch (ServiceException se) {
1729      throw getRemoteException(se);
1730    }
1731  }

1804  /**
1805   * Get the list of region info from a GetOnlineRegionResponse
1806   * @param proto the GetOnlineRegionResponse
1807   * @return the list of region info or empty if <code>proto</code> is null
1808   */
1809  public static List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo>
1810    getRegionInfos(final GetOnlineRegionResponse proto) {
1811    if (proto == null) return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;
1812    List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo> regionInfos =
1813      new ArrayList<>(proto.getRegionInfoList().size());
1814    for (RegionInfo regionInfo : proto.getRegionInfoList()) {
1815      regionInfos.add(toRegionInfo(regionInfo));
1816    }
1817    return regionInfos;
1818  }

1862  /*
1863   * Get the total (read + write) requests from a RegionLoad pb
1864   * @param rl - RegionLoad pb
1865   * @return total (read + write) requests
1866   */
1867  public static long getTotalRequestsCount(RegionLoad rl) {
1868    if (rl == null) {
1869      return 0;
1870    }
1871
1872    return rl.getReadRequestsCount() + rl.getWriteRequestsCount();
1873  }
1874
1875  public static byte[] toDelimitedByteArray(final Message m) throws IOException {
1876    // Allocate arbitrary big size so we avoid resizing.
1877    ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream(4096);
1878    baos.write(PB_MAGIC);
1879    m.writeDelimitedTo(baos);
1880    return baos.toByteArray();
1881  }
1882
1883  /**
1884   * Find the HRegion encoded name based on a region specifier
1885   * @param regionSpecifier the region specifier
1886   * @return the corresponding region's encoded name
1887   * @throws DoNotRetryIOException if the specifier type is unsupported
1888   */
1889  public static String getRegionEncodedName(final RegionSpecifier regionSpecifier)
1890    throws DoNotRetryIOException {
1891    ByteString value = regionSpecifier.getValue();
1892    RegionSpecifierType type = regionSpecifier.getType();
1893    switch (type) {
1894      case REGION_NAME:
1895        return org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.encodeRegionName(value.toByteArray());
1896      case ENCODED_REGION_NAME:
1897        return value.toStringUtf8();
1898      default:
1899        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Unsupported region specifier type: " + type);
1900    }
1901  }
1902
1903  public static ScanMetrics toScanMetrics(final byte[] bytes) {
1904    MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics pScanMetrics = null;
1905    try {
1906      pScanMetrics = MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.parseFrom(bytes);
1907    } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
1908      // Ignored there are just no key values to add.
1909    }
1910    ScanMetrics scanMetrics = new ScanMetrics();
1911    if (pScanMetrics != null) {
1912      for (HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair pair : pScanMetrics.getMetricsList()) {
1913        if (pair.hasName() && pair.hasValue()) {
1914          scanMetrics.setCounter(pair.getName(), pair.getValue());
1915        }
1916      }
1917    }
1918    return scanMetrics;
1919  }
1920
1921  public static MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics toScanMetrics(ScanMetrics scanMetrics, boolean reset) {
1922    MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.Builder builder = MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.newBuilder();
1923    Map<String, Long> metrics = scanMetrics.getMetricsMap(reset);
1924    for (Entry<String, Long> e : metrics.entrySet()) {
1925      HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair nameInt64Pair =
1926        HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair.newBuilder().setName(e.getKey()).setValue(e.getValue()).build();
1927      builder.addMetrics(nameInt64Pair);
1928    }
1929    return builder.build();
1930  }
1931
1932  /**
1933   * Unwraps an exception from a protobuf service into the underlying (expected) IOException. This
1934   * method will <strong>always</strong> throw an exception.
1935   * @param se the {@code ServiceException} instance to convert into an {@code IOException}
1936   */
1937  public static void toIOException(ServiceException se) throws IOException {
1938    if (se == null) {
1939      throw new NullPointerException("Null service exception passed!");
1940    }
1941
1942    Throwable cause = se.getCause();
1943    if (cause != null && cause instanceof IOException) {
1944      throw (IOException) cause;
1945    }
1946    throw new IOException(se);
1947  }
1948
1949  public static CellProtos.Cell toCell(final Cell kv, boolean encodeTags) {
1950    // Doing this is going to kill us if we do it for all data passed.
1951    // St.Ack 20121205
1952    CellProtos.Cell.Builder kvbuilder = CellProtos.Cell.newBuilder();
1953    if (kv instanceof ByteBufferExtendedCell) {
1954      kvbuilder.setRow(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getRowByteBuffer(),
1955        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getRowPosition(), kv.getRowLength()));
1956      kvbuilder.setFamily(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getFamilyByteBuffer(),
1957        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getFamilyPosition(), kv.getFamilyLength()));
1958      kvbuilder.setQualifier(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getQualifierByteBuffer(),
1959        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getQualifierPosition(), kv.getQualifierLength()));
1960      kvbuilder.setCellType(CellProtos.CellType.valueOf(kv.getTypeByte()));
1961      kvbuilder.setTimestamp(kv.getTimestamp());
1962      kvbuilder.setValue(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getValueByteBuffer(),
1963        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getValuePosition(), kv.getValueLength()));
1964      if (encodeTags) {
1965        kvbuilder.setTags(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getTagsByteBuffer(),
1966          ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getTagsPosition(), kv.getTagsLength()));
1967      }
1968    } else {
1969      kvbuilder.setRow(
1970        UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getRowArray(), kv.getRowOffset(), kv.getRowLength()));
1971      kvbuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getFamilyArray(), kv.getFamilyOffset(),
1972        kv.getFamilyLength()));
1973      kvbuilder.setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getQualifierArray(),
1974        kv.getQualifierOffset(), kv.getQualifierLength()));
1975      kvbuilder.setCellType(CellProtos.CellType.valueOf(kv.getTypeByte()));
1976      kvbuilder.setTimestamp(kv.getTimestamp());
1977      kvbuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getValueArray(), kv.getValueOffset(),
1978        kv.getValueLength()));
1979      if (encodeTags) {
1980        kvbuilder.setTags(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getTagsArray(), kv.getTagsOffset(),
1981          kv.getTagsLength()));
1982      }
1983    }
1984    return kvbuilder.build();
1985  }
1986
1987  private static ByteString wrap(ByteBuffer b, int offset, int length) {
1988    ByteBuffer dup = b.duplicate();
1989    dup.position(offset);
1990    dup.limit(offset + length);
1991    return UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(dup);
1992  }
1993
1994  public static Cell toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder, final CellProtos.Cell cell,
1995    boolean decodeTags) {
1996    ExtendedCellBuilder builder = cellBuilder.clear().setRow(cell.getRow().toByteArray())
1997      .setFamily(cell.getFamily().toByteArray()).setQualifier(cell.getQualifier().toByteArray())
1998      .setTimestamp(cell.getTimestamp()).setType((byte) cell.getCellType().getNumber())
1999      .setValue(cell.getValue().toByteArray());
2000    if (decodeTags && cell.hasTags()) {
2001      builder.setTags(cell.getTags().toByteArray());
2002    }
2003    return builder.build();
2004  }
2005
2006  public static HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor toProtoNamespaceDescriptor(NamespaceDescriptor ns) {
2007    HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor.Builder b =
2008      HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor.newBuilder().setName(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(ns.getName()));
2009    for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : ns.getConfiguration().entrySet()) {
2010      b.addConfiguration(
2011        HBaseProtos.NameStringPair.newBuilder().setName(entry.getKey()).setValue(entry.getValue()));
2012    }
2013    return b.build();
2014  }
2015
2016  public static NamespaceDescriptor toNamespaceDescriptor(HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor desc) {
2017    NamespaceDescriptor.Builder b = NamespaceDescriptor.create(desc.getName().toStringUtf8());
2018    for (HBaseProtos.NameStringPair prop : desc.getConfigurationList()) {
2019      b.addConfiguration(prop.getName(), prop.getValue());
2020    }
2021    return b.build();
2022  }
