2024  public static CompactionDescriptor toCompactionDescriptor(
2025    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info, byte[] family, List<Path> inputPaths,
2026    List<Path> outputPaths, Path storeDir) {
2027    return toCompactionDescriptor(info, null, family, inputPaths, outputPaths, storeDir);
2028  }
2029
2030  public static CompactionDescriptor toCompactionDescriptor(
2031    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info, byte[] regionName, byte[] family,
2032    List<Path> inputPaths, List<Path> outputPaths, Path storeDir) {
2033    // compaction descriptor contains relative paths.
2034    // input / output paths are relative to the store dir
2035    // store dir is relative to region dir
2036    CompactionDescriptor.Builder builder = CompactionDescriptor.newBuilder()
2037      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getTable().toBytes()))
2038      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations
2039        .unsafeWrap(regionName == null ? info.getEncodedNameAsBytes() : regionName))
2040      .setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family)).setStoreHomeDir(storeDir.getName()); // make
2041                                                                                                   // relative
2042    for (Path inputPath : inputPaths) {
2043      builder.addCompactionInput(inputPath.getName()); // relative path
2044    }
2045    for (Path outputPath : outputPaths) {
2046      builder.addCompactionOutput(outputPath.getName());
2047    }
2048    builder.setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getRegionName()));
2049    return builder.build();
2050  }
2051
2052  public static FlushDescriptor toFlushDescriptor(FlushAction action,
2053    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo hri, long flushSeqId,
2054    Map<byte[], List<Path>> committedFiles) {
2055    FlushDescriptor.Builder desc = FlushDescriptor.newBuilder().setAction(action)
2056      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes()))
2057      .setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getRegionName()))
2058      .setFlushSequenceNumber(flushSeqId)
2059      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getTable().getName()));
2060
2061    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : committedFiles.entrySet()) {
2062      WALProtos.FlushDescriptor.StoreFlushDescriptor.Builder builder =
2063        WALProtos.FlushDescriptor.StoreFlushDescriptor.newBuilder()
2064          .setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2065          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey())); // relative to region
2066      if (entry.getValue() != null) {
2067        for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2068          builder.addFlushOutput(path.getName());
2069        }
2070      }
2071      desc.addStoreFlushes(builder);
2072    }
2073    return desc.build();
2074  }
2075
2076  public static RegionEventDescriptor toRegionEventDescriptor(EventType eventType,
2077    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo hri, long seqId, ServerName server,
2078    Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles) {
2079    final byte[] tableNameAsBytes = hri.getTable().getName();
2080    final byte[] encodedNameAsBytes = hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes();
2081    final byte[] regionNameAsBytes = hri.getRegionName();
2082    return toRegionEventDescriptor(eventType, tableNameAsBytes, encodedNameAsBytes,
2083      regionNameAsBytes, seqId,
2084
2085      server, storeFiles);
2086  }
2087
2088  public static RegionEventDescriptor toRegionEventDescriptor(EventType eventType,
2089    byte[] tableNameAsBytes, byte[] encodedNameAsBytes, byte[] regionNameAsBytes, long seqId,
2090
2091    ServerName server, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles) {
2092    RegionEventDescriptor.Builder desc = RegionEventDescriptor.newBuilder().setEventType(eventType)
2093      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableNameAsBytes))
2094      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(encodedNameAsBytes))
2095      .setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(regionNameAsBytes)).setLogSequenceNumber(seqId)
2096      .setServer(toServerName(server));
2097
2098    for (Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : storeFiles.entrySet()) {
2099      StoreDescriptor.Builder builder =
2100        StoreDescriptor.newBuilder().setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2101          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey()));
2102      for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2103        builder.addStoreFile(path.getName());
2104      }
2105
2106      desc.addStores(builder);
2107    }
2108    return desc.build();
2109  }
2110
2111  /**
2112   * Return short version of Message toString'd, shorter than TextFormat#shortDebugString. Tries to
2113   * NOT print out data both because it can be big but also so we do not have data in our logs. Use
2114   * judiciously.
2115   * @return toString of passed <code>m</code>
2116   */
2117  public static String getShortTextFormat(Message m) {
2118    if (m == null) return "null";
2119    if (m instanceof ScanRequest) {
2120      // This should be small and safe to output. No data.
2121      return TextFormat.shortDebugString(m);
2122    } else if (m instanceof RegionServerReportRequest) {
2123      // Print a short message only, just the servername and the requests, not the full load.
2124      RegionServerReportRequest r = (RegionServerReportRequest) m;
2125      return "server " + TextFormat.shortDebugString(r.getServer()) + " load { numberOfRequests: "
2126        + r.getLoad().getNumberOfRequests() + " }";
2127    } else if (m instanceof RegionServerStartupRequest) {
2128      // Should be small enough.
2129      return TextFormat.shortDebugString(m);
2130    } else if (m instanceof MutationProto) {
2131      return toShortString((MutationProto) m);
2132    } else if (m instanceof GetRequest) {
2133      GetRequest r = (GetRequest) m;
2134      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(r.getRegion().getValue()) + ", row="
2135        + getStringForByteString(r.getGet().getRow());
2136    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.MultiRequest) {
2137      ClientProtos.MultiRequest r = (ClientProtos.MultiRequest) m;
2138
2139      // Get the number of Actions
2140      int actionsCount =
2141        r.getRegionActionList().stream().mapToInt(ClientProtos.RegionAction::getActionCount).sum();
2142
2143      // Get first set of Actions.
2144      ClientProtos.RegionAction actions = r.getRegionActionList().get(0);
2145      String row = actions.getActionCount() <= 0
2146        ? ""
2147        : getStringForByteString(actions.getAction(0).hasGet()
2148          ? actions.getAction(0).getGet().getRow()
2149          : actions.getAction(0).getMutation().getRow());
2150      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(actions.getRegion().getValue()) + ", for "
2151        + actionsCount + " action(s) and 1st row key=" + row;
2152    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.MutateRequest) {
2153      ClientProtos.MutateRequest r = (ClientProtos.MutateRequest) m;
2154      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(r.getRegion().getValue()) + ", row="
2155        + getStringForByteString(r.getMutation().getRow());
2156    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest) {
2157      ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest r = (ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest) m;
2158      return "coprocessorService= " + r.getCall().getServiceName() + ":"
2159        + r.getCall().getMethodName();
2160    }
2161    return "TODO: " + m.getClass().toString();
2162  }
2163
2164  private static String getStringForByteString(ByteString bs) {
2165    return Bytes.toStringBinary(bs.toByteArray());
2166  }
2167
2168  /**
2169   * Return SlowLogParams to maintain recent online slowlog responses
2170   * @param message Message object {@link Message}
2171   * @return SlowLogParams with regionName(for filter queries) and params
2172   */
2173  public static SlowLogParams getSlowLogParams(Message message, boolean slowLogScanPayloadEnabled) {
2174    if (message == null) {
2175      return null;
2176    }
2177    if (message instanceof ScanRequest) {
2178      ScanRequest scanRequest = (ScanRequest) message;
2179      String regionName = getStringForByteString(scanRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2180      String params = TextFormat.shortDebugString(message);
2181      if (slowLogScanPayloadEnabled) {
2182        return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params, scanRequest.getScan());
2183      } else {
2184        return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2185      }
2186    } else if (message instanceof MutationProto) {
2187      MutationProto mutationProto = (MutationProto) message;
2188      String params = "type= " + mutationProto.getMutateType().toString() + ", row= "
2189        + getStringForByteString(mutationProto.getRow());
2190      return new SlowLogParams(params);
2191    } else if (message instanceof GetRequest) {
2192      GetRequest getRequest = (GetRequest) message;
2193      String regionName = getStringForByteString(getRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2194      String params =
2195        "region= " + regionName + ", row= " + getStringForByteString(getRequest.getGet().getRow());
2196      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2197    } else if (message instanceof MultiRequest) {
2198      MultiRequest multiRequest = (MultiRequest) message;
2199      int actionsCount = multiRequest.getRegionActionList().stream()
2200        .mapToInt(ClientProtos.RegionAction::getActionCount).sum();
2201      RegionAction actions = multiRequest.getRegionActionList().get(0);
2202      String regionName = getStringForByteString(actions.getRegion().getValue());
2203      String params = "region= " + regionName + ", for " + actionsCount + " action(s)";
2204      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2205    } else if (message instanceof MutateRequest) {
2206      MutateRequest mutateRequest = (MutateRequest) message;
2207      String regionName = getStringForByteString(mutateRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2208      String params = "region= " + regionName + ", row= "
2209        + getStringForByteString(mutateRequest.getMutation().getRow());
2210      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2211    } else if (message instanceof CoprocessorServiceRequest) {
2212      CoprocessorServiceRequest coprocessorServiceRequest = (CoprocessorServiceRequest) message;
2213      String params = "coprocessorService= " + coprocessorServiceRequest.getCall().getServiceName()
2214        + ":" + coprocessorServiceRequest.getCall().getMethodName();
2215      return new SlowLogParams(params);
2216    }
2217    String params = message.getClass().toString();
2218    return new SlowLogParams(params);
2219  }
2220
2221  /**
2222   * Convert a list of NameBytesPair to a more readable CSV
2223   */
2224  public static String convertAttributesToCsv(List<NameBytesPair> attributes) {
2225    if (attributes.isEmpty()) {
2226      return HConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
2227    }
2228    return deserializeAttributes(convertNameBytesPairsToMap(attributes)).entrySet().stream()
2229      .map(entry -> entry.getKey() + " = " + entry.getValue()).collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
2230  }
2231
2232  /**
2233   * Convert a map of byte array attributes to a more readable map of binary string representations
2234   */
2235  public static Map<String, String> deserializeAttributes(Map<String, byte[]> attributes) {
2236    return attributes.entrySet().stream().collect(
2237      Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, entry -> Bytes.toStringBinary(entry.getValue())));
2238  }
2239
2240  /**
2241   * Print out some subset of a MutationProto rather than all of it and its data
2242   * @param proto Protobuf to print out
2243   * @return Short String of mutation proto
2244   */
2245  static String toShortString(final MutationProto proto) {
2246    return "row=" + Bytes.toString(proto.getRow().toByteArray()) + ", type="
2247      + proto.getMutateType().toString();
2248  }
2249
2250  public static TableName toTableName(HBaseProtos.TableName tableNamePB) {
2251    return TableName.valueOf(tableNamePB.getNamespace().asReadOnlyByteBuffer(),
2252      tableNamePB.getQualifier().asReadOnlyByteBuffer());
2253  }
2254
2255  public static HBaseProtos.TableName toProtoTableName(TableName tableName) {
2256    return HBaseProtos.TableName.newBuilder()
2257      .setNamespace(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableName.getNamespace()))
2258      .setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableName.getQualifier())).build();
2259  }
2260
2261  public static List<HBaseProtos.TableName> toProtoTableNameList(List<TableName> tableNameList) {
2262    if (tableNameList == null) {
2263      return new ArrayList<>();
2264    }
2265    return tableNameList.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toProtoTableName).collect(Collectors.toList());
2266  }
2267
2268  public static List<TableName> toTableNameList(List<HBaseProtos.TableName> tableNamesList) {
2269    if (tableNamesList == null) {
2270      return new ArrayList<>();
2271    }
2272    return tableNamesList.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableName).collect(Collectors.toList());
2273  }
2274
2275  public static TableName[] getTableNameArray(List<HBaseProtos.TableName> tableNamesList) {
2276    if (tableNamesList == null) {
2277      return new TableName[0];
2278    }
2279    TableName[] tableNames = new TableName[tableNamesList.size()];
2280    for (int i = 0; i < tableNamesList.size(); i++) {
2281      tableNames[i] = toTableName(tableNamesList.get(i));
2282    }
2283    return tableNames;
2284  }

2288   * @return the converted client CellVisibility
2289   */
2290  public static CellVisibility toCellVisibility(ClientProtos.CellVisibility proto) {
2291    if (proto == null) return null;
2292    return new CellVisibility(proto.getExpression());
2293  }
2294
2295  /**
2296   * Convert a protocol buffer CellVisibility bytes to a client CellVisibility
2297   * @return the converted client CellVisibility
2298   */
2299  public static CellVisibility toCellVisibility(byte[] protoBytes) throws DeserializationException {
2300    if (protoBytes == null) return null;
2301    ClientProtos.CellVisibility.Builder builder = ClientProtos.CellVisibility.newBuilder();
2302    ClientProtos.CellVisibility proto = null;
2303    try {
2304      ProtobufUtil.mergeFrom(builder, protoBytes);
2305      proto = builder.build();
2306    } catch (IOException e) {
2307      throw new DeserializationException(e);
2308    }
2309    return toCellVisibility(proto);
2310  }

2314   * @return a protocol buffer CellVisibility
2315   */
2316  public static ClientProtos.CellVisibility toCellVisibility(CellVisibility cellVisibility) {
2317    ClientProtos.CellVisibility.Builder builder = ClientProtos.CellVisibility.newBuilder();
2318    builder.setExpression(cellVisibility.getExpression());
2319    return builder.build();
2320  }

2360  /**
2361   * Convert a protocol buffer TimeUnit to a client TimeUnit
2362   * @return the converted client TimeUnit
2363   */
2364  public static TimeUnit toTimeUnit(final HBaseProtos.TimeUnit proto) {
2365    switch (proto) {
2366      case NANOSECONDS:
2367        return TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS;
2368      case MICROSECONDS:
2369        return TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS;
2370      case MILLISECONDS:
2371        return TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS;
2372      case SECONDS:
2373        return TimeUnit.SECONDS;
2374      case MINUTES:
2375        return TimeUnit.MINUTES;
2376      case HOURS:
2377        return TimeUnit.HOURS;
2378      case DAYS:
2379        return TimeUnit.DAYS;
2380    }
2381    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid TimeUnit " + proto);
2382  }

2393        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS;
2394      case MILLISECONDS:
2395        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS;
2396      case SECONDS:
2397        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.SECONDS;
2398      case MINUTES:
2399        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.MINUTES;
2400      case HOURS:
2401        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.HOURS;

2563  /**

2571    final QuotaScope scope) {

2573      .setTimeUnit(toProtoTimeUnit(timeUnit)).setScope(toProtoQuotaScope(scope)).build();

2577   * Builds a protocol buffer SpaceQuota.
2578   * @param limit           The maximum space usage for the quota in bytes.
2579   * @param violationPolicy The policy to apply when the quota is violated.

2581   */
2582  public static QuotaProtos.SpaceQuota toProtoSpaceQuota(final long limit,
2583    final SpaceViolationPolicy violationPolicy) {

2585      .setViolationPolicy(toProtoViolationPolicy(violationPolicy)).build();

2587
2588  /**
2589   * Generates a marker for the WAL so that we propagate the notion of a bulk region load throughout
2590   * the WAL.
2591   * @param tableName         The tableName into which the bulk load is being imported into.
2592   * @param encodedRegionName Encoded region name of the region which is being bulk loaded.
2593   * @param storeFiles        A set of store files of a column family are bulk loaded.
2594   * @param storeFilesSize    Map of store files and their lengths
2595   * @param bulkloadSeqId     sequence ID (by a force flush) used to create bulk load hfile name
2596   * @return The WAL log marker for bulk loads.
2597   */
2598  public static WALProtos.BulkLoadDescriptor toBulkLoadDescriptor(TableName tableName,
2599    ByteString encodedRegionName, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles,
2600    Map<String, Long> storeFilesSize, long bulkloadSeqId) {
2601    return toBulkLoadDescriptor(tableName, encodedRegionName, storeFiles, storeFilesSize,
2602      bulkloadSeqId, null, true);
2603  }
2604
2605  public static WALProtos.BulkLoadDescriptor toBulkLoadDescriptor(TableName tableName,
2606    ByteString encodedRegionName, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles,
2607    Map<String, Long> storeFilesSize, long bulkloadSeqId, List<String> clusterIds,
2608    boolean replicate) {
2609    BulkLoadDescriptor.Builder desc =
2610      BulkLoadDescriptor.newBuilder().setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName))
2611        .setEncodedRegionName(encodedRegionName).setBulkloadSeqNum(bulkloadSeqId)
2612        .setReplicate(replicate);
2613    if (clusterIds != null) {
2614      desc.addAllClusterIds(clusterIds);
2615    }
2616
2617    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : storeFiles.entrySet()) {
2618      WALProtos.StoreDescriptor.Builder builder =
2619        StoreDescriptor.newBuilder().setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2620          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey())); // relative to region
2621      for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2622        String name = path.getName();
2623        builder.addStoreFile(name);
2624        Long size = storeFilesSize.get(name) == null ? (Long) 0L : storeFilesSize.get(name);
2625        builder.setStoreFileSizeBytes(size);
2626      }
2627      desc.addStores(builder);
2628    }
2629
2630    return desc.build();
2631  }
2632
2633  /**
2634   * This version of protobuf's mergeDelimitedFrom avoid the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding
2635   * buffers
2636   * @param builder current message builder
2637   * @param in      Inputsream with delimited protobuf data
2638   */
2639  public static void mergeDelimitedFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in)
2640    throws IOException {
2641    // This used to be builder.mergeDelimitedFrom(in);
2642    // but is replaced to allow us to bump the protobuf size limit.
2643    final int firstByte = in.read();
2644    if (firstByte != -1) {
2645      final int size = CodedInputStream.readRawVarint32(firstByte, in);
2646      final InputStream limitedInput = ByteStreams.limit(in, size);
2647      final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(limitedInput);
2648      codedInput.setSizeLimit(size);
2649      builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2650      codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2651    }
2652  }
2653
2654  /**
2655   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers
2656   * where the message size is known
2657   * @param builder current message builder
2658   * @param in      InputStream containing protobuf data
2659   * @param size    known size of protobuf data
2660   */
2661  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in, int size)
2662    throws IOException {
2663    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(in);
2664    codedInput.setSizeLimit(size);
2665    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2666    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2667  }
2668
2669  /**
2670   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers
2671   * where the message size is not known
2672   * @param builder current message builder
2673   * @param in      InputStream containing protobuf data
2674   */
2675  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in) throws IOException {
2676    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(in);
2677    codedInput.setSizeLimit(Integer.MAX_VALUE);
2678    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2679    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2680  }
2681
2682  /**
2683   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2684   * working with ByteStrings
2685   * @param builder current message builder
2686   * @param bs      ByteString containing the
2687   */
2688  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, ByteString bs) throws IOException {
2689    final CodedInputStream codedInput = bs.newCodedInput();
2690    codedInput.setSizeLimit(bs.size());
2691    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2692    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2693  }
2694
2695  /**
2696   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2697   * working with byte arrays
2698   * @param builder current message builder
2699   * @param b       byte array
2700   */
2701  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, byte[] b) throws IOException {
2702    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(b);
2703    codedInput.setSizeLimit(b.length);
2704    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2705    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2706  }
2707
2708  /**
2709   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2710   * working with byte arrays
2711   * @param builder current message builder
2712   * @param b       byte array
2713   */
2714  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, byte[] b, int offset, int length)
2715    throws IOException {
2716    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(b, offset, length);
2717    codedInput.setSizeLimit(length);
2718    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2719    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2720  }
2721
2722  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, CodedInputStream codedInput, int length)
2723    throws IOException {
2724    codedInput.resetSizeCounter();
2725    int prevLimit = codedInput.setSizeLimit(length);
2726
2727    int limit = codedInput.pushLimit(length);
2728    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2729    codedInput.popLimit(limit);
2730
2731    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2732    codedInput.setSizeLimit(prevLimit);
2733  }
2734
2735  public static ReplicationLoadSink
2736    toReplicationLoadSink(ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSink rls) {
2737    ReplicationLoadSink.ReplicationLoadSinkBuilder builder = ReplicationLoadSink.newBuilder();
2738    builder.setAgeOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastAppliedOp())
2739      .setTimestampsOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getTimeStampsOfLastAppliedOp())
2740      .setTimestampStarted(rls.hasTimestampStarted() ? rls.getTimestampStarted() : -1L)
2741      .setTotalOpsProcessed(rls.hasTotalOpsProcessed() ? rls.getTotalOpsProcessed() : -1L);
2742    return builder.build();
2743  }
2744
2745  public static ReplicationLoadSource
2746    toReplicationLoadSource(ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSource rls) {
2747    ReplicationLoadSource.ReplicationLoadSourceBuilder builder = ReplicationLoadSource.newBuilder();
2748    builder.setPeerID(rls.getPeerID()).setAgeOfLastShippedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastShippedOp())
2749      .setSizeOfLogQueue(rls.getSizeOfLogQueue())
2750      .setTimestampOfLastShippedOp(rls.getTimeStampOfLastShippedOp())
2751      .setTimeStampOfNextToReplicate(rls.getTimeStampOfNextToReplicate())
2752      .setReplicationLag(rls.getReplicationLag()).setQueueId(rls.getQueueId())
2753      .setRecovered(rls.getRecovered()).setRunning(rls.getRunning())
2754      .setEditsSinceRestart(rls.getEditsSinceRestart()).setEditsRead(rls.getEditsRead())
2755      .setoPsShipped(rls.getOPsShipped());
2756    return builder.build();
2757  }
2758
2759  /**
2760   * Get a protocol buffer VersionInfo
2761   * @return the converted protocol buffer VersionInfo
2762   */
2763  public static HBaseProtos.VersionInfo getVersionInfo() {
2764    HBaseProtos.VersionInfo.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.VersionInfo.newBuilder();
2765    String version = VersionInfo.getVersion();
2766    builder.setVersion(version);
2767    String[] components = version.split("\\.");
2768    if (components != null && components.length > 2) {
2769      builder.setVersionMajor(Integer.parseInt(components[0]));
2770      builder.setVersionMinor(Integer.parseInt(components[1]));
2771    }
2772    builder.setUrl(VersionInfo.getUrl());
2773    builder.setRevision(VersionInfo.getRevision());
2774    builder.setUser(VersionInfo.getUser());
2775    builder.setDate(VersionInfo.getDate());
2776    builder.setSrcChecksum(VersionInfo.getSrcChecksum());
2777    return builder.build();
2778  }
2779
2780  /**
2781   * Convert SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability to SecurityCapability
2782   * @param capabilities capabilities returned in the SecurityCapabilitiesResponse message
2783   * @return the converted list of SecurityCapability elements
2784   */
2785  public static List<SecurityCapability> toSecurityCapabilityList(
2786    List<MasterProtos.SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability> capabilities) {
2787    List<SecurityCapability> scList = new ArrayList<>(capabilities.size());
2788    for (MasterProtos.SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability c : capabilities) {
2789      try {
2790        scList.add(SecurityCapability.valueOf(c.getNumber()));
2791      } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
2792        // Unknown capability, just ignore it. We don't understand the new capability
2793        // but don't care since by definition we cannot take advantage of it.
2794      }
2795    }
2796    return scList;
2797  }
2798
2799  public static TimeRange toTimeRange(HBaseProtos.TimeRange timeRange) {
2800    return timeRange == null
2801      ? TimeRange.allTime()
2802      : new TimeRange(timeRange.hasFrom() ? timeRange.getFrom() : 0,
2803        timeRange.hasTo() ? timeRange.getTo() : Long.MAX_VALUE);
2804  }
2805
2806  /**
2807   * Converts an ColumnFamilyDescriptor to ColumnFamilySchema
2808   * @param hcd the ColumnFamilySchema
2809   * @return Convert this instance to a the pb column family type
2810   */
2811  public static ColumnFamilySchema toColumnFamilySchema(ColumnFamilyDescriptor hcd) {
2812    ColumnFamilySchema.Builder builder = ColumnFamilySchema.newBuilder();
2813    builder.setName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hcd.getName()));
2814    for (Map.Entry<Bytes, Bytes> e : hcd.getValues().entrySet()) {
2815      BytesBytesPair.Builder aBuilder = BytesBytesPair.newBuilder();
2816      aBuilder.setFirst(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getKey().get()));
2817      aBuilder.setSecond(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getValue().get()));
2818      builder.addAttributes(aBuilder.build());
2819    }
2820    for (Map.Entry<String, String> e : hcd.getConfiguration().entrySet()) {
2821      NameStringPair.Builder aBuilder = NameStringPair.newBuilder();
2822      aBuilder.setName(e.getKey());
2823      aBuilder.setValue(e.getValue());
2824      builder.addConfiguration(aBuilder.build());
2825    }
2826    return builder.build();
2827  }
2828
2829  /**
2830   * Converts a ColumnFamilySchema to ColumnFamilyDescriptor
2831   * @param cfs the ColumnFamilySchema
2832   * @return An {@link ColumnFamilyDescriptor} made from the passed in <code>cfs</code>
2833   */
2834  public static ColumnFamilyDescriptor toColumnFamilyDescriptor(final ColumnFamilySchema cfs) {
2835    // Use the empty constructor so we preserve the initial values set on construction for things
2836    // like maxVersion. Otherwise, we pick up wrong values on deserialization which makes for
2837    // unrelated-looking test failures that are hard to trace back to here.
2838    ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder builder =
2839      ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(cfs.getName().toByteArray());
2840    cfs.getAttributesList()
2841      .forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getFirst().toByteArray(), a.getSecond().toByteArray()));
2842    cfs.getConfigurationList().forEach(a -> builder.setConfiguration(a.getName(), a.getValue()));
2843    return builder.build();
2844  }
2845
2846  /**
2847   * Converts an TableDescriptor to TableSchema
2848   * @param htd the TableDescriptor
2849   * @return Convert the current {@link TableDescriptor} into a pb TableSchema instance.
2850   */
2851  public static TableSchema toTableSchema(TableDescriptor htd) {
2852    TableSchema.Builder builder = TableSchema.newBuilder();
2853    builder.setTableName(toProtoTableName(htd.getTableName()));
2854    for (Map.Entry<Bytes, Bytes> e : htd.getValues().entrySet()) {
2855      BytesBytesPair.Builder aBuilder = BytesBytesPair.newBuilder();
2856      aBuilder.setFirst(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getKey().get()));
2857      aBuilder.setSecond(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getValue().get()));
2858      builder.addAttributes(aBuilder.build());
2859    }
2860    for (ColumnFamilyDescriptor hcd : htd.getColumnFamilies()) {
2861      builder.addColumnFamilies(toColumnFamilySchema(hcd));
2862    }
2863    return builder.build();
2864  }
2865
2866  /**
2867   * Converts a TableSchema to TableDescriptor
2868   * @param ts A pb TableSchema instance.
2869   * @return An {@link TableDescriptor} made from the passed in pb <code>ts</code>.
2870   */
2871  public static TableDescriptor toTableDescriptor(final TableSchema ts) {
2872    TableDescriptorBuilder builder =
2873      TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(ProtobufUtil.toTableName(ts.getTableName()));
2874    ts.getColumnFamiliesList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toColumnFamilyDescriptor)
2875      .forEach(builder::setColumnFamily);
2876    ts.getAttributesList()
2877      .forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getFirst().toByteArray(), a.getSecond().toByteArray()));
2878    ts.getConfigurationList().forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getName(), a.getValue()));
2879    return builder.build();
2880  }

2923  /**
2924   * Creates {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Type} from the type of SnapshotDescription
2925   * string
2926   * @param snapshotDesc string representing the snapshot description type
2927   * @return the protobuf SnapshotDescription type
2928   */
2929  public static SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Type
2930    createProtosSnapShotDescType(String snapshotDesc) {
2931    return SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Type.valueOf(snapshotDesc.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT));
2932  }

2935   * Creates {@link SnapshotType} from the {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Type}
2936   * @param type the snapshot description type
2937   * @return the protobuf SnapshotDescription type

2940    return SnapshotType.valueOf(type.toString());

2942
2943  /**
2944   * Convert from {@link SnapshotDescription} to {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription}
2945   * @param snapshotDesc the POJO SnapshotDescription
2946   * @return the protobuf SnapshotDescription
2947   */
2948  public static SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription
2949    createHBaseProtosSnapshotDesc(SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc) {
2950    SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Builder builder =
2951      SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.newBuilder();
2952    if (snapshotDesc.getTableName() != null) {
2953      builder.setTable(snapshotDesc.getTableNameAsString());
2954    }
2955    if (snapshotDesc.getName() != null) {
2956      builder.setName(snapshotDesc.getName());
2957    }
2958    if (snapshotDesc.getOwner() != null) {
2959      builder.setOwner(snapshotDesc.getOwner());
2960    }
2961    if (snapshotDesc.getCreationTime() != -1L) {
2962      builder.setCreationTime(snapshotDesc.getCreationTime());
2963    }
2964    if (
2965      snapshotDesc.getTtl() != -1L
2966        && snapshotDesc.getTtl() < TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(Long.MAX_VALUE)
2967    ) {
2968      builder.setTtl(snapshotDesc.getTtl());
2969    }
2970    if (snapshotDesc.getVersion() != -1) {
2971      builder.setVersion(snapshotDesc.getVersion());
2972    }
2973    if (snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize() != -1) {
2974      builder.setMaxFileSize(snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize());
2975    }
2976    builder.setType(ProtobufUtil.createProtosSnapShotDescType(snapshotDesc.getType()));
2977    return builder.build();
2978  }
2979
2980  /**
2981   * Convert from {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription} to {@link SnapshotDescription}
2982   * @param snapshotDesc the protobuf SnapshotDescription
2983   * @return the POJO SnapshotDescription
2984   */
2985  public static SnapshotDescription
2986    createSnapshotDesc(SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc) {
2987    final Map<String, Object> snapshotProps = new HashMap<>();
2988    snapshotProps.put("TTL", snapshotDesc.getTtl());
2989    snapshotProps.put(TableDescriptorBuilder.MAX_FILESIZE, snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize());
2990    return new SnapshotDescription(snapshotDesc.getName(),
2991      snapshotDesc.hasTable() ? TableName.valueOf(snapshotDesc.getTable()) : null,
2992      createSnapshotType(snapshotDesc.getType()), snapshotDesc.getOwner(),
2993      snapshotDesc.getCreationTime(), snapshotDesc.getVersion(), snapshotProps);
2994  }

2998      stats.getCompactionPressure());
2999  }

3010  /**
3011   * Contain ServiceException inside here. Take a callable that is doing our pb rpc and run it.
3012   */
3013  public static <T> T call(Callable<T> callable) throws IOException {
3014    try {
3015      return callable.call();
3016    } catch (Exception e) {
3017      throw ProtobufUtil.handleRemoteException(e);
3018    }
3019  }

3022   * Create a protocol buffer GetStoreFileRequest for a given region name
3023   * @param regionName the name of the region to get info
3024   * @param family     the family to get store file list
3025   * @return a protocol buffer GetStoreFileRequest
3026   */
3027  public static GetStoreFileRequest buildGetStoreFileRequest(final byte[] regionName,
3028    final byte[] family) {

3031      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);

3054  }

3056  public static CloseRegionRequest buildCloseRegionRequest(ServerName server, byte[] regionName,
3057    ServerName destinationServer, long closeProcId, boolean evictCache) {
3058    CloseRegionRequest.Builder builder =
3059      getBuilder(server, regionName, destinationServer, closeProcId);
3060    builder.setEvictCache(evictCache);
3061    return builder.build();

3063
3064  public static CloseRegionRequest.Builder getBuilder(ServerName server, byte[] regionName,
3065    ServerName destinationServer, long closeProcId) {
3066    CloseRegionRequest.Builder builder = CloseRegionRequest.newBuilder();
3067    RegionSpecifier region =
3068      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
3069    builder.setRegion(region);
3070    if (destinationServer != null) {
3071      builder.setDestinationServer(toServerName(destinationServer));
3072    }
3073    if (server != null) {
3074      builder.setServerStartCode(server.getStartcode());
3075    }
3076    builder.setCloseProcId(closeProcId);
3077    return builder;
3078  }

3080  public static ProcedureDescription buildProcedureDescription(String signature, String instance,
3081    Map<String, String> props) {
3082    ProcedureDescription.Builder builder =
3083      ProcedureDescription.newBuilder().setSignature(signature).setInstance(instance);
3084    if (props != null && !props.isEmpty()) {
3085      props.entrySet().forEach(entry -> builder.addConfiguration(
3086        NameStringPair.newBuilder().setName(entry.getKey()).setValue(entry.getValue()).build()));
3087    }
3088    return builder.build();
3089  }
3090
3091  /**
3092   * Get the Meta region state from the passed data bytes. Can handle both old and new style server
3093   * names.
3094   * @param data      protobuf serialized data with meta server name.
3095   * @param replicaId replica ID for this region
3096   * @return RegionState instance corresponding to the serialized data.
3097   * @throws DeserializationException if the data is invalid.
3098   */
3099  public static RegionState parseMetaRegionStateFrom(final byte[] data, int replicaId)
3100    throws DeserializationException {
3101    RegionState.State state = RegionState.State.OPEN;
3102    ServerName serverName;
3103    if (data != null && data.length > 0 && ProtobufUtil.isPBMagicPrefix(data)) {
3104      try {
3105        int prefixLen = ProtobufUtil.lengthOfPBMagic();
3106        ZooKeeperProtos.MetaRegionServer rl = ZooKeeperProtos.MetaRegionServer.parser()
3107          .parseFrom(data, prefixLen, data.length - prefixLen);
3108        if (rl.hasState()) {
3109          state = RegionState.State.convert(rl.getState());
3110        }
3111        HBaseProtos.ServerName sn = rl.getServer();
3112        serverName = ServerName.valueOf(sn.getHostName(), sn.getPort(), sn.getStartCode());
3113      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3114        throw new DeserializationException("Unable to parse meta region location");
3115      }
3116    } else {
3117      // old style of meta region location?
3118      serverName = parseServerNameFrom(data);
3119    }
3120    if (serverName == null) {
3121      state = RegionState.State.OFFLINE;
3122    }
3123    return new RegionState(
3124      RegionReplicaUtil.getRegionInfoForReplica(RegionInfoBuilder.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO, replicaId),
3125      state, serverName);
3126  }
3127
3128  /**
3129   * Get a ServerName from the passed in data bytes.
3130   * @param data Data with a serialize server name in it; can handle the old style servername where
3131   *             servername was host and port. Works too with data that begins w/ the pb 'PBUF'
3132   *             magic and that is then followed by a protobuf that has a serialized
3133   *             {@link ServerName} in it.
3134   * @return Returns null if <code>data</code> is null else converts passed data to a ServerName
3135   *         instance.
3136   */
3137  public static ServerName parseServerNameFrom(final byte[] data) throws DeserializationException {
3138    if (data == null || data.length <= 0) return null;
3139    if (ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(data)) {
3140      int prefixLen = ProtobufMagic.lengthOfPBMagic();
3141      try {
3142        ZooKeeperProtos.Master rss =
3143          ZooKeeperProtos.Master.parser().parseFrom(data, prefixLen, data.length - prefixLen);
3144        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.HBaseProtos.ServerName sn =
3145          rss.getMaster();
3146        return ServerName.valueOf(sn.getHostName(), sn.getPort(), sn.getStartCode());
3147      } catch (/* InvalidProtocolBufferException */IOException e) {
3148        // A failed parse of the znode is pretty catastrophic. Rather than loop
3149        // retrying hoping the bad bytes will changes, and rather than change
3150        // the signature on this method to add an IOE which will send ripples all
3151        // over the code base, throw a RuntimeException. This should "never" happen.
3152        // Fail fast if it does.
3153        throw new DeserializationException(e);
3154      }
3155    }
3156    // The str returned could be old style -- pre hbase-1502 -- which was
3157    // hostname and port seperated by a colon rather than hostname, port and
3158    // startcode delimited by a ','.
3159    String str = Bytes.toString(data);
3160    int index = str.indexOf(ServerName.SERVERNAME_SEPARATOR);
3161    if (index != -1) {
3162      // Presume its ServerName serialized with versioned bytes.
3163      return ServerName.parseVersionedServerName(data);
3164    }
3165    // Presume it a hostname:port format.
3166    String hostname = Addressing.parseHostname(str);
3167    int port = Addressing.parsePort(str);
3168    return ServerName.valueOf(hostname, port, -1L);
3169  }
3170
3171  /**
3172   * Helper to convert the protobuf Procedure to JSON String
3173   * @return Convert the current Protocol Buffers Procedure to JSON String
3174   */
3175  public static String toProcedureJson(List<ProcedureProtos.Procedure> procProtos) {
3176    JsonArray procJsons = new JsonArray(procProtos.size());
3177    for (ProcedureProtos.Procedure procProto : procProtos) {
3178      try {
3179        JsonElement procJson = ProtobufMessageConverter.toJsonElement(procProto);
3180        procJsons.add(procJson);
3181      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3182        procJsons.add(e.toString());
3183      }
3184    }
3185    return procJsons.toString();
3186  }
3187
3188  public static String toLockJson(List<LockServiceProtos.LockedResource> lockedResourceProtos) {
3189    JsonArray lockedResourceJsons = new JsonArray(lockedResourceProtos.size());
3190    for (LockServiceProtos.LockedResource lockedResourceProto : lockedResourceProtos) {
3191      try {
3192        JsonElement lockedResourceJson =
3193          ProtobufMessageConverter.toJsonElement(lockedResourceProto);
3194        lockedResourceJsons.add(lockedResourceJson);
3195      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3196        lockedResourceJsons.add(e.toString());
3197      }
3198    }
3199    return lockedResourceJsons.toString();
3200  }
3201
3202  /**
3203   * Convert a RegionInfo to a Proto RegionInfo
3204   * @param info the RegionInfo to convert
3205   * @return the converted Proto RegionInfo
3206   */
3207  public static HBaseProtos.RegionInfo
3208    toRegionInfo(final org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info) {
3209    if (info == null) {
3210      return null;
3211    }
3212    HBaseProtos.RegionInfo.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.RegionInfo.newBuilder();
3213    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(info.getTable()));
3214    builder.setRegionId(info.getRegionId());
3215    if (info.getStartKey() != null) {
3216      builder.setStartKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getStartKey()));
3217    }
3218    if (info.getEndKey() != null) {
3219      builder.setEndKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getEndKey()));
3220    }
3221    builder.setOffline(info.isOffline());
3222    builder.setSplit(info.isSplit());
3223    builder.setReplicaId(info.getReplicaId());
3224    return builder.build();
3225  }
3226
3227  /**
3228   * Convert HBaseProto.RegionInfo to a RegionInfo
3229   * @param proto the RegionInfo to convert
3230   * @return the converted RegionInfo
3231   */
3232  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo
3233    toRegionInfo(final HBaseProtos.RegionInfo proto) {
3234    if (proto == null) {
3235      return null;
3236    }
3237    TableName tableName = ProtobufUtil.toTableName(proto.getTableName());
3238    long regionId = proto.getRegionId();
3239    int defaultReplicaId = org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.DEFAULT_REPLICA_ID;
3240    int replicaId = proto.hasReplicaId() ? proto.getReplicaId() : defaultReplicaId;
3241    if (tableName.equals(TableName.META_TABLE_NAME) && replicaId == defaultReplicaId) {
3242      return RegionInfoBuilder.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO;
3243    }
3244    byte[] startKey = null;
3245    byte[] endKey = null;
3246    if (proto.hasStartKey()) {
3247      startKey = proto.getStartKey().toByteArray();
3248    }
3249    if (proto.hasEndKey()) {
3250      endKey = proto.getEndKey().toByteArray();
3251    }
3252    boolean split = false;
3253    if (proto.hasSplit()) {
3254      split = proto.getSplit();
3255    }
3256    RegionInfoBuilder rib = RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(tableName).setStartKey(startKey)
3257      .setEndKey(endKey).setRegionId(regionId).setReplicaId(replicaId).setSplit(split);
3258    if (proto.hasOffline()) {
3259      rib.setOffline(proto.getOffline());
3260    }
3261    return rib.build();
3262  }
3263
3264  public static HBaseProtos.RegionLocation toRegionLocation(HRegionLocation loc) {
3265    HBaseProtos.RegionLocation.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.RegionLocation.newBuilder();
3266    builder.setRegionInfo(toRegionInfo(loc.getRegion()));
3267    if (loc.getServerName() != null) {
3268      builder.setServerName(toServerName(loc.getServerName()));
3269    }
3270    builder.setSeqNum(loc.getSeqNum());
3271    return builder.build();
3272  }

3274  public static HRegionLocation toRegionLocation(HBaseProtos.RegionLocation proto) {
3275    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo regionInfo = toRegionInfo(proto.getRegionInfo());
3276    ServerName serverName = proto.hasServerName() ? toServerName(proto.getServerName()) : null;
3277    return new HRegionLocation(regionInfo, serverName, proto.getSeqNum());
3278  }

3280  public static List<SnapshotDescription>

3283      .filter(snap -> pattern != null ? pattern.matcher(snap.getName()).matches() : true)

3287  public static CacheEvictionStats toCacheEvictionStats(HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats stats)
3288    throws IOException {
3289    CacheEvictionStatsBuilder builder = CacheEvictionStats.builder();
3290    builder.withEvictedBlocks(stats.getEvictedBlocks()).withMaxCacheSize(stats.getMaxCacheSize());
3291    if (stats.getExceptionCount() > 0) {
3292      for (HBaseProtos.RegionExceptionMessage exception : stats.getExceptionList()) {
3293        HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier rs = exception.getRegion();
3294        byte[] regionName = rs.getValue().toByteArray();
3295        builder.addException(regionName, ProtobufUtil.toException(exception.getException()));
3296      }
3297    }
3298    return builder.build();
3299  }

3301  public static HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats
3302    toCacheEvictionStats(CacheEvictionStats cacheEvictionStats) {
3303    HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats.newBuilder();
3304    for (Map.Entry<byte[], Throwable> entry : cacheEvictionStats.getExceptions().entrySet()) {
3305      builder.addException(RegionExceptionMessage.newBuilder()
3306        .setRegion(
3307          RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, entry.getKey()))
3308        .setException(ResponseConverter.buildException(entry.getValue())).build());
3309    }
3310    return builder.setEvictedBlocks(cacheEvictionStats.getEvictedBlocks())
3311      .setMaxCacheSize(cacheEvictionStats.getMaxCacheSize()).build();
3312  }

3317      .setAgeOfLastShippedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastShippedOp())

3319      .setTimeStampOfLastShippedOp(rls.getTimestampOfLastShippedOp())
3320      .setReplicationLag(rls.getReplicationLag()).setQueueId(rls.getQueueId())
3321      .setRecovered(rls.isRecovered()).setRunning(rls.isRunning())
3322      .setEditsSinceRestart(rls.hasEditsSinceRestart())
3323      .setTimeStampOfNextToReplicate(rls.getTimeStampOfNextToReplicate())
3324      .setOPsShipped(rls.getOPsShipped()).setEditsRead(rls.getEditsRead()).build();

3327  public static ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSink

3330      .setAgeOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastAppliedOp())
3331      .setTimeStampsOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getTimestampsOfLastAppliedOp())
3332      .setTimestampStarted(rls.getTimestampStarted())
3333      .setTotalOpsProcessed(rls.getTotalOpsProcessed()).build();
3334  }
3335
3336  public static HBaseProtos.TimeRange toTimeRange(TimeRange timeRange) {
3337    if (timeRange == null) {
3338      timeRange = TimeRange.allTime();
3339    }
3340    return HBaseProtos.TimeRange.newBuilder().setFrom(timeRange.getMin()).setTo(timeRange.getMax())
3341      .build();
3342  }
3343
3344  public static byte[] toCompactionEventTrackerBytes(Set<String> storeFiles) {
3345    HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.Builder builder =
3346      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.newBuilder();
3347    storeFiles.forEach(sf -> builder.addCompactedStoreFile(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(sf)));
3348    return ProtobufUtil.prependPBMagic(builder.build().toByteArray());
3349  }
3350
3351  public static Set<String> toCompactedStoreFiles(byte[] bytes) throws IOException {
3352    if (bytes != null && ProtobufUtil.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes)) {
3353      int pbLen = ProtobufUtil.lengthOfPBMagic();
3354      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.Builder builder =
3355        HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.newBuilder();
3356      ProtobufUtil.mergeFrom(builder, bytes, pbLen, bytes.length - pbLen);
3357      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker compactionEventTracker = builder.build();
3358      List<ByteString> compactedStoreFiles = compactionEventTracker.getCompactedStoreFileList();
3359      if (compactedStoreFiles != null && compactedStoreFiles.size() != 0) {
3360        return compactedStoreFiles.stream().map(ByteString::toStringUtf8)
3361          .collect(Collectors.toSet());
3362      }
3363    }
3364    return Collections.emptySet();
3365  }

3367  public static ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount
3368    toTableRegionStatesCount(RegionStatesCount regionStatesCount) {
3369    int openRegions = 0;
3370    int splitRegions = 0;
3371    int closedRegions = 0;
3372    int regionsInTransition = 0;
3373    int totalRegions = 0;
3374    if (regionStatesCount != null) {
3375      openRegions = regionStatesCount.getOpenRegions();
3376      splitRegions = regionStatesCount.getSplitRegions();
3377      closedRegions = regionStatesCount.getClosedRegions();
3378      regionsInTransition = regionStatesCount.getRegionsInTransition();
3379      totalRegions = regionStatesCount.getTotalRegions();
3380    }
3381    return ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount.newBuilder().setOpenRegions(openRegions)
3382      .setSplitRegions(splitRegions).setClosedRegions(closedRegions)
3383      .setRegionsInTransition(regionsInTransition).setTotalRegions(totalRegions).build();
3384  }

3386  public static RegionStatesCount
3387    toTableRegionStatesCount(ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount regionStatesCount) {
3388    int openRegions = 0;
3389    int splitRegions = 0;
3390    int closedRegions = 0;
3391    int regionsInTransition = 0;
3392    int totalRegions = 0;
3393    if (regionStatesCount != null) {
3394      closedRegions = regionStatesCount.getClosedRegions();
3395      regionsInTransition = regionStatesCount.getRegionsInTransition();
3396      openRegions = regionStatesCount.getOpenRegions();
3397      splitRegions = regionStatesCount.getSplitRegions();
3398      totalRegions = regionStatesCount.getTotalRegions();
3399    }
3400    return new RegionStatesCount.RegionStatesCountBuilder().setOpenRegions(openRegions)
3401      .setSplitRegions(splitRegions).setClosedRegions(closedRegions)
3402      .setRegionsInTransition(regionsInTransition).setTotalRegions(totalRegions).build();

3404
3405  /**
3406   * Convert Protobuf class
3407   * {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.TooSlowLog.SlowLogPayload} To client
3408   * SlowLog Payload class {@link OnlineLogRecord}
3409   * @param slowLogPayload SlowLog Payload protobuf instance
3410   * @return SlowLog Payload for client usecase
3411   */
3412  private static LogEntry getSlowLogRecord(final TooSlowLog.SlowLogPayload slowLogPayload) {
3413    OnlineLogRecord.OnlineLogRecordBuilder onlineLogRecord =
3414      new OnlineLogRecord.OnlineLogRecordBuilder().setCallDetails(slowLogPayload.getCallDetails())
3415        .setClientAddress(slowLogPayload.getClientAddress())
3416        .setMethodName(slowLogPayload.getMethodName())
3417        .setMultiGetsCount(slowLogPayload.getMultiGets())
3418        .setMultiMutationsCount(slowLogPayload.getMultiMutations())
3419        .setMultiServiceCalls(slowLogPayload.getMultiServiceCalls())
3420        .setParam(slowLogPayload.getParam()).setProcessingTime(slowLogPayload.getProcessingTime())
3421        .setQueueTime(slowLogPayload.getQueueTime()).setRegionName(slowLogPayload.getRegionName())
3422        .setResponseSize(slowLogPayload.getResponseSize())
3423        .setBlockBytesScanned(slowLogPayload.getBlockBytesScanned())
3424        .setFsReadTime(slowLogPayload.getFsReadTime())
3425        .setServerClass(slowLogPayload.getServerClass()).setStartTime(slowLogPayload.getStartTime())
3426        .setUserName(slowLogPayload.getUserName())
3427        .setRequestAttributes(convertNameBytesPairsToMap(slowLogPayload.getRequestAttributeList()))
3428        .setConnectionAttributes(
3429          convertNameBytesPairsToMap(slowLogPayload.getConnectionAttributeList()));
3430    if (slowLogPayload.hasScan()) {
3431      try {
3432        onlineLogRecord.setScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(slowLogPayload.getScan()));
3433      } catch (Exception e) {
3434        LOG.warn("Failed to convert Scan proto {}", slowLogPayload.getScan(), e);
3435      }
3436    }
3437    return onlineLogRecord.build();
3438  }
3439
3440  private static Map<String, byte[]>
3441    convertNameBytesPairsToMap(List<NameBytesPair> nameBytesPairs) {
3442    return nameBytesPairs.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(NameBytesPair::getName,
3443      nameBytesPair -> nameBytesPair.getValue().toByteArray()));
3444  }

3446  /**
3447   * Convert AdminProtos#SlowLogResponses to list of {@link OnlineLogRecord}
3448   * @param logEntry slowlog response protobuf instance
3449   * @return list of SlowLog payloads for client usecase
3450   */
3451  public static List<LogEntry> toSlowLogPayloads(final HBaseProtos.LogEntry logEntry) {
3452    try {
3453      final String logClassName = logEntry.getLogClassName();
3454      Class<?> logClass = Class.forName(logClassName).asSubclass(Message.class);
3455      Method method = logClass.getMethod("parseFrom", ByteString.class);
3456      if (logClassName.contains("SlowLogResponses")) {
3457        AdminProtos.SlowLogResponses slowLogResponses =
3458          (AdminProtos.SlowLogResponses) method.invoke(null, logEntry.getLogMessage());
3459        return slowLogResponses.getSlowLogPayloadsList().stream()
3460          .map(ProtobufUtil::getSlowLogRecord).collect(Collectors.toList());
3461      }
3462    } catch (ClassNotFoundException | NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException
3463      | InvocationTargetException e) {
3464      throw new RuntimeException("Error while retrieving response from server");
3465    }
3466    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid response from server");
3467  }

3469  /**
3470   * Convert {@link ClearSlowLogResponses} to boolean
3471   * @param clearSlowLogResponses Clear slowlog response protobuf instance
3472   * @return boolean representing clear slowlog response
3473   */
3474  public static boolean toClearSlowLogPayload(final ClearSlowLogResponses clearSlowLogResponses) {
3475    return clearSlowLogResponses.getIsCleaned();
3476  }
3477
3478  public static CheckAndMutate toCheckAndMutate(ClientProtos.Condition condition,
3479    MutationProto mutation, CellScanner cellScanner) throws IOException {
3480    byte[] row = condition.getRow().toByteArray();
3481    CheckAndMutate.Builder builder = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row);
3482    Filter filter = condition.hasFilter() ? ProtobufUtil.toFilter(condition.getFilter()) : null;
3483    if (filter != null) {
3484      builder.ifMatches(filter);
3485    } else {
3486      builder.ifMatches(condition.getFamily().toByteArray(), condition.getQualifier().toByteArray(),
3487        CompareOperator.valueOf(condition.getCompareType().name()),
3488        ProtobufUtil.toComparator(condition.getComparator()).getValue());
3489    }
3490    TimeRange timeRange = condition.hasTimeRange()
3491      ? ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(condition.getTimeRange())
3492      : TimeRange.allTime();
3493    builder.timeRange(timeRange);
3494
3495    try {
3496      MutationType type = mutation.getMutateType();
3497      switch (type) {
3498        case PUT:
3499          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toPut(mutation, cellScanner));
3500        case DELETE:
3501          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toDelete(mutation, cellScanner));
3502        case INCREMENT:
3503          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(mutation, cellScanner));
3504        case APPEND:
3505          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toAppend(mutation, cellScanner));
3506        default:
3507          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Unsupported mutate type: " + type.name());
3508      }
3509    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
3510      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e.getMessage());
3511    }
3512  }
3513
3514  public static CheckAndMutate toCheckAndMutate(ClientProtos.Condition condition,
3515    List<Mutation> mutations) throws IOException {
3516    assert mutations.size() > 0;
3517    byte[] row = condition.getRow().toByteArray();
3518    CheckAndMutate.Builder builder = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row);
3519    Filter filter = condition.hasFilter() ? ProtobufUtil.toFilter(condition.getFilter()) : null;
3520    if (filter != null) {
3521      builder.ifMatches(filter);
3522    } else {
3523      builder.ifMatches(condition.getFamily().toByteArray(), condition.getQualifier().toByteArray(),
3524        CompareOperator.valueOf(condition.getCompareType().name()),
3525        ProtobufUtil.toComparator(condition.getComparator()).getValue());
3526    }
3527    TimeRange timeRange = condition.hasTimeRange()
3528      ? ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(condition.getTimeRange())
3529      : TimeRange.allTime();
3530    builder.timeRange(timeRange);
3531
3532    try {
3533      if (mutations.size() == 1) {
3534        Mutation m = mutations.get(0);
3535        if (m instanceof Put) {
3536          return builder.build((Put) m);
3537        } else if (m instanceof Delete) {
3538          return builder.build((Delete) m);
3539        } else if (m instanceof Increment) {
3540          return builder.build((Increment) m);
3541        } else if (m instanceof Append) {
3542          return builder.build((Append) m);
3543        } else {
3544          throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
3545            "Unsupported mutate type: " + m.getClass().getSimpleName().toUpperCase());
3546        }
3547      } else {
3548        return builder.build(new RowMutations(mutations.get(0).getRow()).add(mutations));
3549      }
3550    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
3551      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e.getMessage());
3552    }
3553  }
3554
3555  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final byte[] family,
3556    final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value, final Filter filter,
3557    final TimeRange timeRange) throws IOException {
3558
3559    ClientProtos.Condition.Builder builder =
3560      ClientProtos.Condition.newBuilder().setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(row));
3561
3562    if (filter != null) {
3563      builder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
3564    } else {
3565      builder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family))
3566        .setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations
3567          .unsafeWrap(qualifier == null ? HConstants.EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY : qualifier))
3568        .setComparator(ProtobufUtil.toComparator(new BinaryComparator(value)))
3569        .setCompareType(HBaseProtos.CompareType.valueOf(op.name()));
3570    }
3571
3572    return builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(timeRange)).build();
3573  }
3574
3575  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final Filter filter,
3576    final TimeRange timeRange) throws IOException {
3577    return toCondition(row, null, null, null, null, filter, timeRange);
3578  }
3579
3580  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final byte[] family,
3581    final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value, final TimeRange timeRange)
3582    throws IOException {
3583    return toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, null, timeRange);
3584  }

3586  public static List<LogEntry> toBalancerDecisionResponse(HBaseProtos.LogEntry logEntry) {
3587    try {
3588      final String logClassName = logEntry.getLogClassName();
3589      Class<?> logClass = Class.forName(logClassName).asSubclass(Message.class);
3590      Method method = logClass.getMethod("parseFrom", ByteString.class);
3591      if (logClassName.contains("BalancerDecisionsResponse")) {
3592        MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse response =
3593          (MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse) method.invoke(null, logEntry.getLogMessage());
3594        return getBalancerDecisionEntries(response);
3595      }
3596    } catch (ClassNotFoundException | NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException
3597      | InvocationTargetException e) {
3598      throw new RuntimeException("Error while retrieving response from server");
3599    }
3600    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid response from server");
3601  }

3620  public static List<LogEntry>
3621    getBalancerDecisionEntries(MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse response) {
3622    List<RecentLogs.BalancerDecision> balancerDecisions = response.getBalancerDecisionList();
3623    if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(balancerDecisions)) {
3624      return Collections.emptyList();
3625    }
3626    return balancerDecisions.stream()
3627      .map(balancerDecision -> new BalancerDecision.Builder()
3628        .setInitTotalCost(balancerDecision.getInitTotalCost())
3629        .setInitialFunctionCosts(balancerDecision.getInitialFunctionCosts())
3630        .setComputedTotalCost(balancerDecision.getComputedTotalCost())
3631        .setFinalFunctionCosts(balancerDecision.getFinalFunctionCosts())
3632        .setComputedSteps(balancerDecision.getComputedSteps())
3633        .setRegionPlans(balancerDecision.getRegionPlansList()).build())
3634      .collect(Collectors.toList());
3635  }
3636
3637  public static List<LogEntry>
3638    getBalancerRejectionEntries(MasterProtos.BalancerRejectionsResponse response) {
3639    List<RecentLogs.BalancerRejection> balancerRejections = response.getBalancerRejectionList();
3640    if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(balancerRejections)) {
3641      return Collections.emptyList();
3642    }
3643    return balancerRejections.stream()
3644      .map(balancerRejection -> new BalancerRejection.Builder()
3645        .setReason(balancerRejection.getReason())
3646        .setCostFuncInfoList(balancerRejection.getCostFuncInfoList()).build())
3647      .collect(Collectors.toList());
3648  }

3701
3702  /**
3703   * Check whether this IPBE indicates EOF or not.
3704   * <p/>
3705   * We will check the exception message, if it is likely the one of
3706   * InvalidProtocolBufferException.truncatedMessage, we will consider it as EOF, otherwise not.
3707   */
3708  public static boolean isEOF(InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3709    return e.getMessage().contains("input has been truncated");
3710  }
3711
3712  /**
3713   * This is a wrapper of the PB message's parseDelimitedFrom. The difference is, if we can not
3714   * determine whether there are enough bytes in stream, i.e, the available method does not have a
3715   * valid return value, we will try to read all the bytes to a byte array first, and then parse the
3716   * pb message with {@link Parser#parseFrom(byte[])} instead of call
3717   * {@link Parser#parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream)} directly. This is because even if the bytes are
3718   * not enough bytes, {@link Parser#parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream)} could still return without any
3719   * errors but just leave us a partial PB message.
3720   * @return The PB message if we can parse it successfully, otherwise there will always be an
3721   *         exception thrown, will never return {@code null}.
3722   */
3723  public static <T extends Message> T parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream in, Parser<T> parser)
3724    throws IOException {
3725    int firstByte = in.read();
3726    if (firstByte < 0) {
3727      throw new EOFException("EOF while reading message size");
3728    }
3729    int size = CodedInputStream.readRawVarint32(firstByte, in);
3730    int available = in.available();
3731    if (available > 0) {
3732      if (available < size) {
3733        throw new EOFException("Available bytes not enough for parsing PB message, expect at least "
3734          + size + " bytes, but only " + available + " bytes available");
3735      }
3736      // this piece of code is copied from GeneratedMessageV3.parseFrom
3737      try {
3738        return parser.parseFrom(ByteStreams.limit(in, size));
3739      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3740        throw e.unwrapIOException();
3741      }
3742    } else {
3743      // this usually means the stream does not have a proper available implementation, let's read
3744      // the content to an byte array before parsing.
3745      byte[] bytes = new byte[size];
3746      ByteStreams.readFully(in, bytes);
3747      return parser.parseFrom(bytes);
3748    }
3749  }
3750}
